yor: Láti le ṣe àṣeyorí nípa àwọn ètò ìdàgbàsókè wọ̀nyí, àjọ àgbáyé bí i ilé ìfowópamọ́ àgbáyé, ilé ìfowópamọ́ ti orílẹ̀-èdè Áfíríkà àti àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ mìíràn ti ṣetán láti ṣètò ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè yìí, tí wọ́n bá lèe fọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ láti le gbógun ti àwọn ìṣòro tó ń dojú kọ wọ́n.

en: The UN had also said that it would have provided assistance to no fewer than 6.1 million people affected by the Boko Haram crisis in Northeast Nigeria by the end of 2018.
yor: Àjọ UN ti ní òun yóò pèsè ètò ìràwọ́ fún àwọn tí iye wọn lé ní mílíọ́nù mẹ́fà lorílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà , tí ikọ̀ Boko Haram kọlù ní ẹ̀kùn Ìlà -oòrùn Àríwá  lorílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà kí ọdún 2018 ó tó parí.

en: UN Resident and Humanitarian Coordinator for Nigeria, Mr Edward Kallon, said at a recent event in New York, that Nigeria was still facing a crisis of global magnitude.
yor: Edward Kallon, t’ó jẹ́ aṣojú àjọ UN ni ẹ̀ka ètò ìrànwọ́ fún orílẹ̀-èdè Nàjíríà sọ̀rọ̀ ní New York níbi ìpàdé kan pé orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ń kojú àwọn ìṣòro púpò.

en: Over 10.2 million people affected in three states in Northeast Nigeria, 7.7 million people in need of humanitarian assistance.
yor: Ó lé ní mílíọ́nù mẹ́wàá àwọn ènìyàn tó wà ní ìpínlẹ̀ mẹ́ta lorílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà tó wà ní ẹ̀kùn Ìlà -oòrùn Àríwá tí wọ́n nílò ètò ìrànwọ́.

en: August 30, 2018 --- Lagos state governor host Britain Prime Minister
yor: August 30, 2018 --- Gómìnà ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó gba adarí ìjọba Britain lálejò.

en: Lagos state governor, Akinwunmi Ambode host Britain Prime Minister Theresa May, he told him that Lagos state is a place where investors settled.
yor: Gómìnà ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó, Akínwùnmí Ambode gba adarí ìjọba orílẹ̀-èdè Britain, Theresa May lálejò , ó sọ fún un pé ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó jẹ́ ibi tí àwọn oníṣòwò tẹ̀dó sí.

en: The Governor show his happiness to welcome Britain Prime minister, He said the relationship between Nigeria and Britain has being for long.
yor: Gómìnà fi ìdùnnú rẹ̀ hàn láti tẹ́wọ́ gba adarí ìjọba orílẹ̀-èdè Britain ni àlejò, ó só pé ìbáṣepọ̀ tó wà láàárín orílẹ̀-èdè Nàíjíríà àti Britain ti wà láti ọjọ́ pípẹ́.

en: He said education, culture and the governance Nigerians are practicing, was leant from Britain.
yor: Ó ní ìmọ̀ ẹ̀kọ́, àṣà, ìṣèlú ti àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ń múlò, ló jẹ́ pé láti orílẹ̀-èdè Britain ni wọ́n ti kọ́ọ.

en: Ambode added that a good place to invest, Lagos state allow investors to invest most especially they have a stable government as the economy of Lagos is big as compared to the population in Lagos, regard for the law and stable judgment.
yor: Ibi tí ó dára láti dá okoòwò sílẹ̀, Ambode fi kún ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ pé, ìlú Èkó fi ààyè gba àwọn oníṣòwò láti dá ilé-iṣẹ́ wọn sílẹ̀, pàápàá jùlọ ,wọ́n ní ètò  ìṣèjoba tí ó fẹsẹ̀ múlẹ̀, bí ètò ọrọ̀-ajé ìlú Èkó ṣe tóbi púpọ̀ sí, iye àwọn ènìyàn tó ń gbé inú ìlú náà, ìbọ̀wọ̀ fún òfin àti ètò ìdájọ́ tó fẹsẹ̀ múlẹ̀.

en: He said “we deliberated with Britain government most especially on how the Britain investors will bring development to Lagos economy.
yor: Ó sọ pé “a jíròrò pẹ̀lú adarí ìjọba orílẹ̀-èdè Britain, pàápàá jùlọ lórí bí àwọn oníṣòwò orílẹ̀-èdè Britain yóò ṣe mú ìdàgbàsókè bá et̀ò okoòwò nílùú Èkó.

en: As you know that is a place where investors settled in Nigeria.
yor: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹ ṣe mọ̀ pé ìlú Èkó ni ibi tí àwọn oníṣòwò gúnlẹ̀ sí lorílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà.

en: Many Britain citizen have business in Lagos.
yor: Ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Britain ló ní okoòwò nílùú Èkó.

en: ‘Governor also said as May came into Lagos, it will allow more business and security development.
yor: "Gómìnà tún sọ pé bí May ṣe wá sílùú Èkó, yóò tún jẹ́ kí ètò okoòwò àti ààbò tún ní ìdàgbàsókè sí i.

en: He said Britain citizen have the opportunity to partake in many businesses in Lagos, as empowerment, technology, finance, social amenities and companies.
yor: Ó ní àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Britain ní àǹfààní láti lọ́wọ́ nínú ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ okoòwò tó wà nílùú Èkó, bi i ètò agbára, ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, ètò ìṣúná owó, ohun amáyé-dẹrùn àti ilé–iṣẹ́.

en: Lagos has been taking many steps to encourage investors to invest.
yor: Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìgbésẹ̀ ni ìlú Èkó ti ń gbé láti mú ohun ìwùrí dé bá àwọn oníṣòwò láti dá okoòwò sílẹ̀.

en: We have much work done on judiciary, and Britain Prime Minister was happy with this.
yor: Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ iṣẹ́ lati ṣe, lórí ètò ìdájọ́, inú adarí ìjọba orílẹ̀-èdè Britain sì dùn sí eléyìí.

en: He is ready to support us, to help money lending program and development on finance.
yor: Ó sì ti ṣetán láti ṣe àtìlẹyìn fún wa láti ṣèrànwọ́ ètò èyáwó àti ìdàgbàsókè lórí ètò ìnáwó.

en: The governor said he will try to all within his capacity to establish the relationship between Lagos state and Britain the more.
yor: "Ètó ìbáṣepọ̀ Gómìnà sọ pé ìjọba òhun yóò gbìyànjú láti ṣe ohun tó wà níkàwọ́ọ́ rẹ̀ láti túbọ̀ feṣè ìbáṣepọ̀ tó wà láàárín ìlú Èkó àti Britain múlẹ̀ sí i.

en: He said ‘we have spoken on technology, social amenities and investment.
yor: Ó sọ pé ‘a ti sọ̀rọ̀ nípa ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, ohun amáyédẹrùn àti ìdásílẹ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́.

en: The relationship between Lagos state and Britain started many years back.
yor: Ìbáṣepọ̀ tó wà láàárín ìlú Èkó àti orílẹ̀-èdè Britain bẹ̀rẹ̀ láti ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ọdún ṣ́eyìn.

en: As you know, Lagos was made the capital city by the Britain during the time of the colonial masters, that is why we must see that many businesses from Britain must be in Lagos.
yor: Bí ẹ ti mọ̀ pé, ìlú Èkó ni orílẹ̀-èdè Britain fi ṣe olú-ìlú lásìkò ìjọba amúnisìn, Ìdí nìyí tí a gbọ́dọ̀ ṣe ri i pé ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ okoòwò láti orílẹ̀-èdè Britain ló gbọ́dọ̀ wà nílùú Èkó.

en: Britain Prime Minister went round Lagos and he is ready to collaborate with us to allow the Britain citizen invest more business in Nigeria.
yor: Adarí ìjọba orílẹ̀-èdè Britain ti lọ yíká ìlú Èkó, ó sì ti ṣetán láti tún fọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ pẹ̀lú wa, láti tún jẹ́ kí àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Britain tún dá okoòwò sílẹ̀ si i.

en: The Britain Prime Minister has shown his happiness when speaking with news men at the airport in Lagos, that he is happy to come to Nigeria especially to Lagos to see how companies are successful.
yor: "Adarí ìjọba orílẹ̀-èdè Britain fi ìdùnnú rẹ̀ hàn nígbà tí ó ń bá àwọn akọròyìn sọ̀rọ̀ ni pápá bàálù tó wà nílùú Èkó, pé inú òhun dùn láti wá sí orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà pàápàá jùlọ sí ìlú Èkó láti rí bí àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ ṣe ń ṣe àṣeyọrí.

en: He said ‘I am happy to come to Nigeria especially Lagos, a good relationship is between Nigeria and Britain and we have a lot of things to do in the future.
yor: Ó sọ pé “Inú mi dùn láti wá sí orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, pàápàá jùlọ sí ìlú Èkó, ìbáṣepọ̀ tó dán mọ́nrán wà láàárín orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà àti Britain, a sì ní ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ nǹkan pàtàkì láti ṣe lọ́jọ́ iwájú.

en: I enjoyed Abuja and Lagos, and I’m happy with the successful economy there.
yor: Mo gbádùn ìlú Àbújá àti Èkó, inú mi sì dùn bi ètò ọrọ̀-ajé ṣe ń ṣe àṣeyọrí níbẹ̀.

en: We want the economy of Nigeria and UK to develop, and invest many businesses in Nigeria, businesses in Britain will be useful in Nigeria.
yor: “A fẹ́ kí ìdàgbàsókè bá ètò ọrọ̀-ajé orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà àti Uk, kí a dá ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ iṣẹ́ sílẹ̀ lorílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, iṣẹ́ tó wà lorílẹ̀-èdè Britain yóò wúlò lorílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà.

en: I thank the Governor of Lagos state.
yor: Mo dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ gómìnà ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó.

en: “He said Lagos state did so well to encourage investors in the state.
yor: ’’Ó ní ìlú Èkó ti ṣe gudugudu méje, yàyà mẹfà láti leè mú ìwúrí bá àwọn oníṣòwò ní ìpínlẹ̀ náà.

en: Mrs. May said they have made provision to borrow about seven hundred and fifty million Pound Sterling that Lagos state can benefit from.
yor: Arábìnrin May, sọ pé àwọn ti ṣètò èyáwó tí iye rẹ̀ tó mílíọ́nù ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́gbẹ̀rinléláàdọ́ta owó pọ́ùn tí ìlú Èkó náà sì le è jẹ àǹfààní rẹ̀.

en: Britain Prime Minister also said she came with her group who are engineers which Lagos state can benefit from.
yor: Adarí ìjọba orílẹ̀-èdè Britain tún sọ pé òun wà pẹ̀lú àwọn aṣojú rẹ̀ tó ní ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, ní èyí tí ìlú Èkó lèe jẹ àǹfààní rẹ̀.

en: Investing business, she also said Britain is ready to assist Lagos state on business and that the jacket she was wearing was made in Nigeria.
yor: Dídá okoòwò sílẹ̀. Ó tún sọ pé orílẹ̀-èdè Britain ti ṣetán láti ran ìlú Èkó lọ́wọ́ nípa ètò okoòwò àti pé orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ni wọ́n ti ṣe aṣo jáákẹ́tì tí òun ń wọ̀.

en: Part of those that came to welcome the Prime Minister at expertly 4:30pm in the evening at the airport are, Governor and his Deputy, Dr. Oluranti Adebule and the secretary to the state government, Mr. Tunji Bello and the special assistance to the government and the director of foreign affairs Prof. Ademola abass.
yor: Lára àwọn tó wá pàdé adarí ìjọba orílẹ̀-èdè Britain nígbà tó dé sí pápá ọkọ̀ òfuurufú ní déédé aago mẹ́rin àbọ̀ ọ̀san, ni gómìnà àti Igbákejì Gómìnà, Ọ̀mọ̀wé Olúrántí Adébulé, akọ̀wé ìjọba ìpínlẹ̀, Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Túnjí Bello àti olùrànlọ́wọ́ pàtàkì ìjọba àti olùdarí ọ̀rọ̀ t’ó jẹ mọ́ ti ilẹ̀ òkèère, ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Adémọ́lá Abass.

en: ---President Buhari had an indoor meeting with Britain Prime Minister.
yor: ---Ààrẹ Buhari ṣe ìpàdé bòńkẹ́lẹ́ pẹ̀lú Adarí ìjọba orílẹ̀-èdè Britain.

en: The president of Nigeria Muhammadu Buhari and Britain Prime Minister, Theresa May had an indoor meeting at the presidential house in Abuja.
yor: Ààrẹ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàíjíríà Muhammadu Buhari àti Adarí ìjọba orílẹ̀-èdè Britain, Theresa May ṣe ìpàdé bòńkẹ́lẹ́ nílé Ààrẹ t’ó wà nílùú Àbújá.

en: The meeting started at the office of the president at the state house, the moment May came to the state house at expertly 12:00noon.
yor: Ìpàdé náà bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní ófíísì ile Ààrẹ, ní kété tí May dé sí ilé–Ààrẹ ní déédé aago méjìlá ọ̀sán.

en: President Buhari and Directors at the federal government offices came to welcome May.
yor: Ààrẹ Buhari àti àwọn Adarí ilé-iṣẹ́ ìjọba àpapọ̀ ni wọ́n wá pàdé May.

en: The meeting will be on the how to establish the Nigeria and Britain relationship.
yor: Ìpàdé náà ni yóò dá lórí ọ̀nà tí ìbáṣepọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà àti Britain yóò ṣe túbọ̀ fẹsẹ̀ múlẹ̀ sii.

en: These two nations will sign a memorandum of understanding on security and development.
yor: Orílẹ̀-èdè méjèèjì yìí, ni yóò tún máa tọwọ́bọ ìwé ìgbọ́ra-ẹni yé (ìbáṣepọ̀) lórí ètò ààbò àti ìdàgbàsókè.

en: Nigeria is part of the Nations May want to visit in Africa.
yor: Orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà wà lára orílẹ̀-èdè tí May fẹ́ kàn sí nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà.

en: ---Turkey lock up suspects because of the attack on the American embassy.
yor: ---Turkey ti àwọn afurasí mọ́lé látàrí ìkọlù sílé aṣojú orílẹ̀-èdè Améríkà.

en: Turkish police force has arrested another two suspects on the accusation that, they are part of those that attacked United State embassy which came on Monday at the capital of the country which is Ankara.
yor: Ilé-iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá lórílẹ̀-èdè Turkey tún ti mú àwọn afurasí méjì mííràn látàrí ẹ̀sùn tí wọ́n fi kàn wọ́n pé, wọ́n lọ́wọ́ sí ìkọlù sílé aṣojú orílẹ̀-èdè Amẹ́ríkà (United States embassy) èyí tí ó wáyé lọ́jọ́ Ajé ní olú-ìlú orílẹ̀-èdè ọ̀hún tí ń ṣe Ankara.

en: According to the news, those concerned said the attacked was possibly from the NATO militant.
yor: Gẹ́gẹ bí ìròyìn ṣe sọ, ìkọlù náà ni àwọn tọ́rọ̀ kàn sọ pé, ó ṣeéṣe kó jẹ́ pé àwọn ọmọ ogun ọlọ́tẹ̀ NATO ni ó wà nídì rẹ̀.

en: Now total number of suspects in detention is four with the two suspect that just joined them.
yor: Ni báyìí, àpapọ̀ àwọn afurasí tí ó wà nínú àtìmọ́lé jẹ́ mẹ́rin pẹ̀lú àwọn méjì tí ó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ darapọ̀ mọ́ wọn.

en: The police force said two out of the suspects were drunk during the attack.
yor: Ilé-iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá sọ pé, méjì nínú àwọn afurasí náà mu otí àmupara lásìkò ìkọlù náà.

en: It was also established that no one was injured in the attack.
yor: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ìròyìn tún fi múlẹ̀ pé ẹnikẹ́ni kò farapa nínú ìkọlù náà.

en: ---Two people die at the screen sport competition in Florida.
yor: ---Àwọn ènìyàn méjì ni ó kú níbi ìdíje eré ìdárayá orí ẹ̀rọ agbáwòrán ní ìpínlẹ̀ Florida.

en: One participant in the screen sport competition in Jacksonville, Florida, in America has killed himself after shut two people who died immediately.
yor: Olùkópa kan nínú ìdíje ere-ìdárayá orí ẹ̀rọ agbáwòrán nílùú Jacksonville, ní ìpínlẹ̀ Florida, lórílẹ̀-èdè Amẹ́ríkà tí gbẹ̀mí ara rẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí ó yìnbọn mọ́ ènìyàn méjì tí wọ́n sí pàdánù ẹ̀mí wọn lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀.

en: According to the police, the name of the suspect is David Katz, twenty-four years old who is in Baltimore.
yor: Gẹ́gẹ bí ilé-iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá ṣe sọ, wọ́n ní, orúkọ afurasí ọ̀hún ń jẹ́ David Katz, ọmọ ọdún mẹ́rìnlélógún tí ó wá láti ìlú Baltimore.

en: So also, eleven more people were brutally injured at the recreation center around Jacksonville on Sunday.
yor: Bákan náà, ènìyàn mọ́kànlá mìíràn tún farapa yánayàna ní gbàgede ìgbáfẹ́ lágbègbè Jacksonville lọ́jọ́ Àìkú (Sunday).

en: According to eye witness, it was established that, Katz was angry because of his failure to win the American football eSport event which made him to misbehave.
yor: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí àwọn tí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ọ̀hún ṣojú wọn, wọ́n fi múlẹ̀ pé, inú ló bí Katz látààrí pé kò jáwé olúborí nínú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù Amẹ́ríkà ọ̀hún (American football eSports event), ní èyí tí ó mú wu ìwà lọ́nà àìtọ́.

en: Now, the names of those injured in the incident are yet to be announced, until they pardoned their families, though some people have been showing concern on the esport event website.
yor: Ní báyìí, wọn kòì tíì kéde orúko àwọn tí ó fara kááṣá ìjàmbá náà, di ìgbà tí wọ́n bá tó fojúri àwọn ẹbí wọn, bí ó ti lè jẹ́ pé àwọn mìíràn tí ń ṣèdárò lórí ibùdó-ìtakùn esport.

en: Different accident is happening in Florida about some years ago, and the incident that occurred around the Pulse night club in Orland in the year 2016, the incident that killed forty nine people, also the incident that killed seventeen people in Marjory Stoneman Douglas School around Parkland in February this month.
yor: Oríṣiríṣi ìjàmbá ló tí ń wáyé ní ìpínlẹ̀ Florida láti ọdún mélòó kan ṣẹ́yìn, tí ó fi mọ́ ìjàmbá tí ó wáyé ní gbàgede ìgbáfẹ́ alẹ́ nílùú Orlando lọdún 2016 (Pulse nightclub), ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ tí ó ṣekú pa ènìyàn mọ́kàndínláàdọ́ta, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ tí ó tún ṣekú pa ènìyàn mẹ́tàdínlógún nílé ìwé Marjory Stoneman Douglas ní agbègbè Parkland nínú oṣù kejì oṣù yìí.

en: ---Iran promised to support the reformation of Syria.
yor: ---Iran ṣèlérí láti ṣàtìlẹyìn fún àtúnṣe orílẹ̀-èdè Syria.

en: Iran has decided to fulfill her promise in a way to support the reformation in Syria through the provision of budget, an established politics and the support for the soldiers.
yor: Orílẹ̀-èdè Iran ti ṣèpinnu láti mú ìlérí rẹ̀ ṣẹ lójúnà láti sàtìlẹyìn fún àtúnṣe orílẹ̀-èdè Syria nípasẹ̀ pípèsè ètò ìṣúná, òṣèlú tí ó fẹsẹ̀ múlẹ̀ àti àtìlẹyìn ikọ̀ ọmọ ogun.

en: Amir Hatami who is the Minister in charge of security in Iran told the news men during his meeting with the Syrian President Bashar al-Assad and Minister for defense in the country, Ali Abdullah Ayyoub.
yor: Amir Hatami tí ó jẹ́ Mínísítà tó ń mójútó ètò ààbò lorílẹ̀-èdè Iran ló jábọ̀ ọ̀rọ̀ náà fún àwọn akọròyìn lásìkò ìpàdé rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Ààrẹ orílẹ̀-èdè Syria Bashar al-Assad àti Mínísítà tó ń mójútó ètò ààbò, Ali Abdullah Ayyoub lórílẹ̀-èdè náà.

en: The two nations had agreement to collaborate on the reformation of Syria, and will not allow other nation to partake in the reformation.
yor: Orílẹ̀-èdè méjèèjì jọ ní àdéhùn pé wọn yóò jọ fọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ mú àtunṣe bá ilẹ̀ Syria, tí wọn kò sì ní fàyè gba orílẹ̀-èdè mìíràn láti lọ́wọ́ sí àtunṣe ọ̀hún.

en: Hatami said ‘ Syria is in a junction that is important now, because the nation has gone through so difficult things, and the nation is on the way to start the reformation ‘according to department of finance and environment in the United nations establish it that Syria has loss three hundred and eighty eight billion dollar ($388bn) as a result of different incidents and conflict since 2011.
yor: Hatami sọ pé,“Syria wà ní ìkoríta tí ó ṣe pàtàkì báyìí, nítorí àwọn ohun tí orílẹ̀-èdè yìí ti làkọjá ṣẹ́yìn lágbára púpọ̀, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ojúnà láti bẹ̀rẹ̀ àtúnṣe ni Ó wà lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́,"Gẹ́gẹ́ bi ẹ̀ka tó ń mójúto ètò ọrọ̀-ajé ìlú àti ọrọ̀ àyíká nínú àjọ ìṣokan àgbáyé, wọ́n fi múlẹ̀ pé orílẹ̀-èdè Syria ti pàdánù ọ́ọ̀dúnrún bílíọ́nù ó lé méjídínláàdọ́rù- ún owó dollar ($388bn) látààrí onírúurú ìjàm̀bá àti ogun tí ó tí ń wáyé láti ọdún 2011 sẹ́yìn.

en: Last month, President Assad explained that the reformation of Syria is of importance to him, after many Iran citizen have lost their life and some their houses and their properties in the different incidents.
yor: Nínú oṣù tí ó kọjá, Ààrẹ Assad ṣàlàyé pé, láti ṣe àtúnṣe sí ilẹ̀ Syria ló jẹ òun lógún jùlọ, lẹ́yìn tí ogúnlógó àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Iran ti pàdánù ẹ̀mí wọn ti àwọn mìíràn sì pàdánù ilé àti àwọn ohun ìní wọn sínú ọlọ́kan-ò-jọ̀kan ìjàm̀bá náà.

en: ---The airline stolen in Seattle-Tacoma has crashed in an Island.
yor: ---Ọkọ̀ òfuurufú tí wọ́n jígbé ní Seattle-Tacoma ti já l’Érèkùsù kan.

en: An airline staff that stole an air plane at Seattle airport in America has crashed in an Island.
yor: Òṣìṣẹ́ ọlọ́kọ̀ òfuurufú kan tó’ jí bàálù kan gbé ní pápákọ̀ òfuurufú Seattle l’órílẹ̀-èdè Amẹ́ríkà ti lọ forí ṣọ́npọ́n ní Èrèkùsù kan.

en: The authority said the airplane took off on Friday without taking permission to take off from the airport which made the government to lock up Seattle-Tacoma airport.
yor: Àwọn aláṣe ní bàálù náà gbéra lọ́jọ́ Etì láìgba àṣẹ láti gbéra kúrò ní pápákọ̀ òfuurufú ní èyí t’ó jẹ́ kí ìjọba ti pápákọ̀ Seattle-Tacoma pa.

en: Two combat airlines F15 were chosen to follow and search for the airline before hearing its crash with a great noise.
yor: Àwọn ọkọ̀ òfuurufú ajagun méjì F15 ni wọ́n yàn láti tẹ̀lé àti lọ wá bàálù náà kí wọ́n tó gbọ́ bó ṣe já pẹ̀lú ariwo ńlá.

en: The commissioner of Police in the area, Pearl Pasor said it was not rebels that stole the airplane but a pilot of twenty nine years old
yor: Ọ̀ga ọlọ́pàá agbègbè náà, Pearl Pasor ní kì í ṣe àwọn agbẹ́sùnmómi l’ó jí i bíkòṣe ọlọ́kọ̀ òfuurufú ọmọ ọdún mọ́kàndínlọ́gbọ́n.

en: A screen picture showed that, appeals were made to the man to land safely before the plane crashed.
yor: Àwòrán ojúìwò kan fihàn pé wọ́n ti ń rọ ọkùnrin náà k’ó balẹ̀ l’álàáfíà k’ó tó di pé ọkọ̀ òfuurufú náà já.

en: Seattle Times newspaper described that the man as a someone who does not care about anything and have send many video clips online where he was using an airline Q400 belonging to Alaska Airlines for different display.
yor: Ìwé ìròyìn The Seattle Times ṣàpèjúwe ọkùnrin náà gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹni tí kò nání nǹkankan t’ó ti fi ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwòrán-olóhùn sórí ayélujára níbi t’ó ti ń fi ọkọ̀ òfuurufú Q400 kan tó jẹ́ ti Alaska Airlines dárà lóríṣiiríṣi.

en: Leah Morse, who took the picture of how the man was landing said he took note that something was wrong with the airline on air before landing close to his house with loud noise.
yor: Leah Morse, t’ó ya àwòrán bí ọkọ̀ òfuurufú náà ṣe ń balẹ̀ ni òun ṣàkíyèsí pé nǹkankan ń ṣe ọkọ̀ náà lójú òfuurufú k’ó tó wá balẹ̀ nítòsí ilé òun pẹ̀lú ariwo ńlá.

en: ---Nigerian government will charge the customer of Russian airline.
yor: ---Ìjọba Nàìjíríà yóò gbé àwọn oníbàrá ìrinnà ọkọ̀ òfuurufú Russia lọ sílé ẹjọ́.

en: Federal government of Nigeria has planned to charge the customer of the airline that conveyed the lovers to Russia but failed to take them back to Nigeria, which make the people to become wanderer after the football cup competition in Russia.
yor: Ìjọba àpapọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ti pinnu láti gbé àwọn oníbàrá ọkọ̀  òfuurufú tó kó  àwọn olólùfẹ́ lọ sí orílẹ̀-èdè Russia  ṣùgbọ́n  tí wọ́n kùnà láti kó wọn  adà sí orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, ní èyí tí ó jẹ́ kí  àwọn  ènìyàn náà di alárìnká lẹ́yìn ife ẹ̀yẹ bọ́ọ̀lù 2018 tó wáyé ní orílẹ̀-èdè Russia.

en: Nigeria ambassador to Russia, Prof. Steve Ugba said this on an online video clip, in which he sent to the speaker of the commission on foreign affairs Tope Elias-Fatile on Sunday in Abuja.
yor: Aṣojú orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà sí orílẹ̀-èdè Russia ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Steve Ugba l’ó sọ̀rọ̀ yìí lórí ẹ̀rọ fídíò ayélujára, ní èyí tí ó fi ránṣẹ́ sí agbẹnusọ̀rọ̀ àjọ t’ó ń rí sí ọ̀rọ̀ ilẹ̀ òkèkèrè, Tope Elias-Fàtile lọ́jọ́ Àìkú, nílùú Àbújá.

en: Ugba made the lovers of Nigeria in Moscow, Russia understand the situation of the government before going to Nigeria.
yor: Ugba jẹ́ kí àwọn olólùfẹ́ ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà tó wà ní Moscow, ní Russia mọ̀, ipò tí ìjọba wà, kí ó tó lọ sí orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà.

en: Over one hundred and fifty Nigerians that are football fans that airline customers failed to return to Nigeria, in that they also went to Nigeria embassy in Moscow on 12th of July, to seek assistant from the commission after the football game competition.
yor: Ó lé ní àádọ́jọ (150) olólùfẹ́ eré bọ́ọ̀lù tí wọn jẹ ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà tí àwọn oníbàrá ọkọ̀ òfúrufú kùnà láti kó padà wá sí orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, ní èyi tí  àwọn ènìyàn náà lọ sí ilé-iṣẹ́ tó ń ṣojú orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ní Moscow lọ́jọ́ kejìlá oṣù keje, láti bèèrè fún ìrànlọ́wọ́ láti ọ̀dọ àjọ náà lẹ́yìn tí eré bọ́ọ̀lù ìdárayá t’ó wáyé lọ́dún yìí parí.

en: On the 16th the President of Nigeria Mohammadu Buhari has commanded the for foreign affairs Geoffrey Onyeama and his colleague on aviation Hadi Sirika, to convey all Nigerian back to Nigeria immediately.
yor: Lọ́jọ́ kẹrìndínlógún ni Ààrẹ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà Muhammadu Buhari ti pàṣẹ fún Mínísítà tó ń rí sí ilẹ̀ òkèèrè Geoffrey Onyeama àti akẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀, t’ó ń rí sí ọ̀rọ̀ tó jẹ mọ́ ọkọ̀ òfuurufú Hadi Sirika, láti kó gbogbo àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà padà wá sí ìlú Àbújá ní kíákía.

en: Before the day an Ethiopia airline has conveyed one hundred and fifty-four people to Abuja on the 20th of July.
yor: Ṣáájú ọjọ́ náà ni bàálù Ethiopia ti kó àwọn ènìyàn márùndínlọgọ́jọ wá sí ìlú Àbújá ní ogúnjọ́ oṣù keje.

en: They showed their displeasure to the President of Nigeria Muhammadu Buhari to see to it that those people return home.
yor: Àwọn ènìyàn náà kò sàì fi ìdùnnú wọn hàn sí Ààrẹ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà Muhammadu Buhari láti rí i pé àwọn ènìyàn náà padà wá sílé.

en: Ugba, said the government of this nation will not allow accused go free, He now appealed to the Nigerian football fans to send their report to their ministry, so that the government will arrest the accused.
yor: Ugba, ní ìjọba orílẹ̀-èdè yìí kò ní jẹ́ kí àwọn ọ̀daràn náà lọ ní àlááfíà, ó wá rọ àwọn olólùfẹ́ eré ìdárayá tó jẹ́ ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà láti fi ìwé àkọsílẹ̀ wọn ránṣẹ́ sí ilé-iṣẹ́ wọn, láti lè jẹ́ kí ìjọba mú àwọn ọ̀daràn náà.

en: “Give us the report about the people that cheated you, that take away your money, to give them the right punishment in Nigeria.
yor: “Ẹ fún wa ní ìwé àkọsílẹ̀ tí ẹ ni nípa àwọn ènìyàn tó lù yín ní jìbìtì, tàbí tí wọ́n gbé e yín lówó lọ, kí a lè fìyà tó tọ́ jẹ wọn ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà.

en: We will not allow them go unpunished.
yor: A ò ní jẹ́ kí wọn lọ láì jìyà.

en: Because of this, give us the report you have about them.
yor: Nítorí náà, ẹ fún wa ni ìwé àkọsílẹ̀ ti ẹ ni nípa wọn.

en: He also said “we are waiting for them in Nigeria, this type of attitude shows that you are good people and that you respect yourself and your nation.
yor: Ó tún sọ pé “à ń dúró de wọ́n ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, irú ìwá tí ẹ hù yìí, fihàn pé ẹ jẹ́ ọmọlúàbí, pé ẹ tún ní ìbọ̀wọ̀ fún ara yín àti orílẹ̀-èdè yín.

en: ‘It is not a crime that we come to Russia, for it to be a crime coming back home’
yor: “Kì í ṣe ìwà ọ̀daràn ni pé, ẹ wá sí orílẹ̀-èdè Russia, kí ó wá jẹ́ ìwà ọ̀daràn láti padà sílé.

en: ‘it is a crime for anyone that sell ticket to you, and fail to return you home after receiving the payment for the return ticket so it’s not your fault.’
yor: “Ìwà ọ̀daràn ni, fún ẹni tí o ta ìwé ìrìnnà fún un yín, ṣ̀ugbọ́n tí ó kùnà láti kó o yín padà wá sílé, lẹ́yìn tí ó ti gba owó láti kó yín padà, nítorí náà, kì í ṣe ẹ̀bi yín.

en: He also said ‘we will make sure those who did this are punished under the law, so that such will not repeat itself.
yor: Ó tún sọ̀ pé “A ó ri i pé a fìyà jẹ àwọn tó hu irú ìwà yìí, lábẹ òfin, tó fi jẹ pe lọ́jọ́ mìíràn, wọn kò ní hu irú ìwà bẹ́ẹ̀ mo.

en: ‘Ugba also said Nigeria commend thisfans has they have travelled to Russia to honor the Super Eagles in Russia.
yor: ’’Ugba tún sọ pé orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà gbóṣùbà fún àwọn olólùfẹ́ yìí bí wọ́n ṣe lọ sí orílẹ̀-èdè Russia láti lo yẹ àwọn Super Eagles sí lorílẹ̀-èdè Russia.

en: He said this act has made Nigeria a special friend with Russia.
yor: Ó ní ìwà tí wọ́n hù yìí, tí jẹ kí orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà jẹ́ ọ̀rẹ́ pàtàkì pẹ̀lú orílẹ̀-èdè Russia.

en: ---President Trump will renovate the presidential airplane.
yor: ---Ààrẹ Trump yóò ṣàtúnṣe sí bàálù òfuurufú ti ààrẹ.

en: The President of America, Donald Trump has said he will renovate the presidential airplane by painting it red, white and blue.
yor: Ààrẹ orílẹ̀-èdè Amẹ́ríkà, Donald Trump ti sọ pé òhun yóò ṣàtúnṣe sí bàálù òfuurufú ti ilé-iṣẹ́ ààrẹ nípa kíkùn ún ní pupa, funfun àti búlúù.

en: Trump said ‘it is good that the new Boeing airplane be painted red, white and blue.
yor: Trump ní pé "ó dára kí bàálù tuntun Boeing jẹ́ kíkùn sí ọ̀dà pupa, funfun àti àwọ̀ aró.

en: The former president of America, John F. Kennydy and his wife choose this color in 1960.
yor: Ààrẹ àná orílẹ̀-èdè Amẹ́ríkà, John F Kennedy àti ìyàwó rẹ̀, ni wọ́n mú ọ̀dà yìí lọ́dún 1960.

en: A new stage and this new stage will end in 2021.
yor: Ìpílẹ̀ tuntun àmọ́ṣá ìpílẹ̀ tuntun yìí yóò parí lọ́dún 2021.

en: Trump said this in Scotland on Sunday that, the airplane will be useful for the Presidents in the future because it will last many years.
yor: Trump sọ̀rọ̀ yìí ní Scotland lọ́jọ́ ìsinmi ọ̀sẹ̀ yìí pé, bàálù náà yóò tún wúlò fún àwọn’’ ààrẹ lọ́jọ́ iwájú’’’nítorí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ọdún ti yóò lò.

en: Trump also said ‘we shall have many Presidents that benefit from this.
yor: Trump tún sọ pé “a ó ní ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ Ààrẹ, tí wọn yóò jẹ ànfààní yìí.

en: The renovation to the airplane will be so good, and will be the best in the whole world.
yor: Àtúnṣe sí bàálù òfuurufú náà yóò dára púpọ̀, yóò tún jẹ́ èyí tó dára jùlọ ní àgbáyé".

en: The American air force has two airplanes.
yor: Ilé-iṣẹ́ ọmọ ogun orí òfuurufú orílẹ̀-èdè Amẹ́rikà ní bàálù méjì̀.

en: In 1959 President Dwight Eisenhowe used the first airplane, with red and gold paint, but during the government of President Kennedy the airplane uses a blue and white paint till today.
yor: Lọ́dún 1959 ni Ààrẹ Dwight D Eisẹnhowe lo bàálù àkọ́kọ́, t’ó àwọ̀ pupa àti wúrà ṣùgbọ́n láyé Ààrẹ Kennedy bàálù náà tún lo àwọ̀ aró àti funfun, títí di òní yìí.

en: The oppositions have started sending comments on his twitter account that Russian, China and France airplane also have a red white and blue color, therefore Trump should retain the color.
yor: Àwọn alátakò tí ń sọ̀rọ̀ lórí ìṣàmúlò ẹ̀rọ twitter rẹ̀ pé bàálù orílẹ̀-èdè Russia, China àti France náà ní ọ̀dà pupa, funfun àti àwọ̀ aró, nítorí náà kí Trump fi ọ̀dà náà sílẹ̀ bó ṣe wà.

en: The news house in America said President Trump is planning to renovate the airplane.
yor: Ilé-iṣẹ́ akoròyìn ní orílẹ̀-èdè Amẹ́ríkà sọ pé Ààrẹ Trump tí ń gbèrò láti ṣe àtúnṣe sí bàálù náà.

en: The news also reported that Trump want the airplane to like new ‘look like America’s and turn from looking like Jackie Kennedy paint’, that which Raymond Loewy said it look like a ship.
yor: Ìròyìn tún sọ pé ààrẹ̀ Trump fẹ́ kí bàálù náà tún dà bíi tuntun "kó dà bí ti Amẹ́ríkà, kò yí kúrò ní èyí tó dà bí i ti ọ̀dà Jackie Kennedy’’, ní èyí tí Raymond Loewy sọ pé ó dà bí ọkọ̀ ojú omi.

en: The airplane has been in use for thirty years, and it was George H W Bush who first flied in it.
yor: Bàálù òfuurufú náà ti lo ọgbọ̀n ọdún, Ààrẹ George H W Bush, ni wọ́n kọ́kọ́ fi gbé.

en: When President Trump won as the president of America, he spoke on his twitter account that to buy a presidential plane will cost four billion dollars, which he cancelled.
yor: Nígbà tí ààrẹ̀ Trump jáwé olúborí gẹ́gẹ́ bi ààrẹ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Amẹ́ríkà, ó sọ̀rọ̀ lórí ìṣàmúlò twitter rẹ̀ pé, láti ra bàálù tí yóò máa gbé ààrẹ̀ yóò na wọn ni bílíọ́nù mẹ́rin dọ́là, ní èyí tí ó fagilé.

en: ---President Buhari arrived Hague for ICC meeting.
yor: ---Ààrẹ Buhari dé sí Hague fún ìpàdé àgbáyé ICC.

en: On Sunday evening, the president of Nigeria Mohammadu Buhari arrived Netherlands before his journey to the world court for the criminal act, ICC in Hague.
yor: Ní ìrọ̀lẹ́ ọjọ́ Àìkú ni Ààrẹ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà Muhammadu Buhari dé sí orílẹ̀-èdè Netherlands ṣáájú ìrìnàjò rẹ̀ lọ sí ilé-ẹjọ́ àgbáyé fún ìwà ọ̀daràn, ICC nílùú Hague.

en: The president airplane landed in Rotterdamat Hague airport around 7:23pm Nigeria time.
yor: Bàálù Ààrẹ balẹ̀ sí Rotterdam ní pápá òfúrufú Hague ní déédé aago méje kọjá ìṣẹ́jú mẹ́tàlélógún ọ̀sán, àkókò orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà.

en: The president of the world court ICC, Justice Eboe-Osuji, and his vice for the court Marc Perrin de Brichambut and Minister for foreign affairs, Geoffrey Onyeama, went to welcome the president at the airport.
yor: Ààrẹ ilé-ẹjọ́ àgbáyé ICC, adájọ́ Chile Eboe-Osuji, àti igbákejì rẹ̀ fún ilé-ẹjọ́ náà, Marc Perrin de Brichambut àti Mínísítà fún ọ̀rọ̀ ilẹ̀ òkèèrè, Geoffrey Onyeama, ni wọn jọ lọ pàdé Ààrẹ ní pápá òfúrufú náà.

en: Part of those at the airport are Oji Ngofa, Nigeria ambassador for Netherlands, Mr. Robert Petri who is the Netherlands ambasssardor for Nigeria, General Veenhuijzen, special assistant to the Netherlands King and the Directors for the ministry of foreign affairs in Netherlands.
yor: Lára àwọn tó tún wà ní pápá òfúrufú náà ni Oji Ngofa, aṣojú orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà fún orílẹ̀-èdè Netherlands,ọ̀gbẹ́ni Robert Petri  tó jẹ́ aṣojú orílẹ̀-èdè Netherlands fún orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà , ọ̀gágun Veenhuijzen,olùrànlọ́wọ́ ọba orílẹ̀-èdè Netherlands àti àwọn ọ̀gá àgbà fún ilé-iṣẹ́ tó ń rí sí ọ̀rọ̀ ilẹ̀ òkèèrè lórílẹ̀-èdè Netherlands.

en: The special assistant to the President on media and publicity, Femi Adesina said that the President will use the opportunity to speak at the occasion of twenty years anniversary that Rome joined the world court and see to criminality.
yor: Olùràlọ́wọ́ Ààrẹ lórí ìròyìn àti ìpolongo, Fẹ́mi Adésínà sọ pé Ààrẹ yóò lo àǹfààní náà láti tún sọ̀rọ̀ níbi ayẹyẹ àjọ̀dún ogún ọdún tí orílẹ̀-èdè Rome wà lára ilé-ẹjọ́ àgbáyé tó ń rí sí ìwà ọ̀daràn.

en: The president will also use the opportunity to see Mrs. Fatou Bensouda who is also an ICC lawyer.
yor: Ààrẹ yóò tún máa lo àǹfààní náà láti rí arábìnrin Fatou Bensouda t’ó tún jẹ́ agbẹjọ́rò fún àjọ ICC.

en: Femi Adesina also said ‘he is the only president invited on the occasion of twenty years anniversary and and the directors in the ministries in Nigeria saw this invitation as a means to appreciate the support given by Nigeria for the day.
yor: Fẹ́mi Adésínà tún sọ pé “òun nìkan ni Ààrẹ tí wọ́n pè fún ayẹyẹ àjọ̀dún ogún ọdún àti pé àwọn ọ̀gá àgbà ilé-iṣẹ́ lorílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà rí pípè yìí gẹ́gẹ́ bi ọ̀nà láti fi dúpẹ́ lórí àtìlẹyìn tí orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ń ṣe fún àjọ náà.

en: Before the President arrival at Hague, Nigeria Ambassador said though some are against the world court in charge of criminality yet President Buhari believed that the court work will put an end to criminality in the world.
yor: Kí Ààrẹ tó dé sí Hague ni aṣojú orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ti bá àwọn akọ̀ròyìn sọ̀rọ̀ pé b’ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé àwọn kan ń tako ilé-ẹjọ́ àgbáyé tó ń rí sí ìwà ọ̀daràn síbẹ̀ Ààrẹ Buhari nígbàgbọ́ pé iṣẹ́ tí ilé-ẹjọ́ àgbáyé náà ń ṣe yóò dẹ́kun àwọn ìwà ọ̀daràn l’órílẹ̀-èdè àgbáyé.

en: ‘Since twenty years ago Nigeria has been a back bone for the world court most especially in Africa.
yor: ‘Láti bi ogún ọdún ṣẹ́yìn ni orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà tí ń jẹ́ igi lẹ́yìn ọgbà fún ilé-ẹj̀ọ àgbáyé, pàápàá jùlọ l’órílẹ̀-èdè Áfíríkà.

en: Therefore, the president’s journey to the world court is a way to show his pleasure to the support.
yor: Nítorí náà, ìrìnàjò Ààrẹ wá sí ilé-ẹjọ́ àgbáyé jẹ́ ọ̀nà láti fi ìfẹ́ hàn sí àtìlẹ́yìn rẹ̀.

en: The ambassador also said ‘there is assurance that the president journey will also show that Nigeria is a supporter of Roman decision.
yor: Aṣojú náà tún sọ pé ‘‘ìdánilójú wà pé ìrìnàjò Ààrẹ yóò tún fihàn pé orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà jẹ́ alátìlẹyìn fún ìpinnu Rome.

en: ---President Buhari mourns Plateau Senator, Longjan
yor: ---Ààrẹ Buhari dárò ikú aṣòfin Longjan

en: President Muhammadu Buhari has extended heartfelt condolences to the National Assembly, government and people of Plateau State over the demise of Senator Ignatius Longjan, who represented Plateau South.
yor: Ààrẹ Muhammadu Buhari ti bá ilé ìgbìmọ̀ aṣòfin, ìjọba àti àwọn ènìyàn ìpínlẹ̀ Plateau dárò lórí ikú aṣòfin Ignatius Longjan tó ń ṣojú fún ilà Gúúsù ìpínlẹ̀ Plateau.

en: The President commiserates with family, friends and political associates of the senator, who served the state as a deputy governor, 2011-2015, and had also served the country as a career diplomat for many years.
yor: Ààrẹ bá ẹbí, ọ̀rẹ́ àti àwọn ìsọ̀ngbè aṣòfin náà tí ó jẹ́ igbákejì gómìnà lọ́dún 2011-15, t’ó tún jẹ́ aṣojú orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà fún ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ọdún kẹ́dùn.

en: The President prays that the Almighty God will grant the soul of the departed rest.
yor: Ààrẹ wá gbàdúrà pé kí Ọlọ́run tẹ́ olóògbé náà sí afẹ́fẹ́ ire.

en: ---Police reiterates committment towards ending banditry
yor: ---Ilé-iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá kò ní kàárẹ̀ láti túbọ̀ máa gbógun ti ìwà ọ̀daràn.

en: Nigeria Police has reiterated it’s commitment towards ending all banditry and other crimes in the Country.
yor: Ilé-iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá l’órílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà ti ní òhun kò ní kàárẹ̀ láti túbọ̀ máa gbógun ti ìwà ọ̀daràn l’órílẹ̀ èdè yìí.

en: Inspector General of Police Mr. Mohammed Adamu Abubakar stated this when he visited the gallant officers who were injured during the operation that was carried out in Kuduru Forest in Birnin Gwari Local Council of Kaduna State.
yor: Adarí ilé-iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá lórílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà, Mohammed Adamu ló sọ̀rọ̀ yìí lásìkò tó ń ṣe àbẹ̀wò sí àwọn akínkanjú ọlọ́pàá tó farapa nígbà tí wọn ń wọ̀yá ìjà pẹ̀lú àwọn ọ̀daràn nínú igbó Kuduru tó wà ní ìjọba ìbílẹ̀ Birnin Gwari, ní ìpínlẹ̀ Kaduna.

en: Represented by the Deputy Inspector General of Police in charge of operations, Mr. Abdulmajid Ali said he was sent by the Inspector General of Police to see the condition of the gallant officers who were injured during the operation.
yor: Igbákejì adarí ilé–iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá, Abdulmajid Ali tó ṣojú fún adarí ilé-iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá orílẹ̀ èdè yìí ni adarí ilé-iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá ló ní kí òun wá wo àwọn akínkanjú ọlọ́pàá náà, tí wọn farapa níbi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ tó wáyé pẹ̀lú àwọn ọ̀daràn ọ̀hún.

en: He expressed satisfaction with the pace of health improvement of the injured men, whom he said are very stable. “The Doctor treating them said there is no need to worry as they are responding to treatment“.
yor: Ó ní inú òun dún pẹ̀lú ìtọ́jú tí àwọn ọlọ́pàá náà ń gbà nílé ìwòsàn, ó ní. “Àwọn dókítà ń tọ́jú àwọn tó farapa náà, nítorí náà kò sí ìbẹ̀rù nípa ìtọ́jú tí wọn ń gbà“.

en: He assured the injured men of receiving the best of treatment.
yor: Ó wá fi dá àwọn tó farapa náà lójú pé, wọn yóò gba ìtọ́jú tó péye.

en: The DIG disclosed that, unfortunately, they lost another officer which increased the number of death to two. They are Muhammad Abubakar and Sergeant Idris.
yor: Igbákejì adarí ilé–iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá náà ní ó seni láàánú pé àwọn ọlọ́pàá méjì ló gbẹ́mìí mì. Orúkọ àwọn ọlọ́pàá tí wọn kú náà ní Muhammad Abubakar àti Sergeant Idris

en: ---The World Health Organisation has urged the Nigerian government to strengthen surveillance in nine Coronavirus prone states.
yor: ---Àjọ tó ń mójútó ètò ìlera ní àgbáyé ti rọ orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà láti mójútó gbogbo ẹnu ibodè ati ibùdó ọkọ tó wà lórílẹ̀ èdè yìí nípa gbígbógun ti ìwà ààrùn ohun ọsin, coronavirus, pàápàá jùlọ ní àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ mẹ́sàn án tó wà lórílẹ̀ èdè yìí.

en: WHO Technical Officer on Health Emergence Programme, Ms Dhamari Naidoo made the appeal at a media sensitisation workshop organized by the WHO, in Abuja.
yor: Alákòsóo ètò àkànse fún ètò pàjáwìrì ní ẹka àjọ WHO, arábìnrin, Dhamari Naidoo sọ̀rọ̀ yìí lásìkò ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwò pẹ̀lú àwọn akọ̀ròyìn nílùú Àbújá.

en: She said that some of the states in Nigeria that are highly prone to coronavirus infection includes: Abuja, Lagos, Kano, Cross River, Akwa Ibom, Port Harcourt, Enugu, Delta, and Bayelsa.
yor: Ó tẹ̀síwájú pé àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ tó wà nínú ewu láti ní ààrun coronavirus lórílẹ̀ èdè yìí ni: Àbújá, Èkó, Kano, Cross River, Akwa Ibom, Port Harcourt, Enugu, Delta, ati Bayelsa.

en: She, however, noted that Nigeria has strengthened diagnostic testing capacity at National Reference Laboratory in Gaduwa, Abuja and at LUTH, Lagos currently being supported to implement testing.
yor: Ó tún sọ pé àjọ WHO ti ṣètò ìrànwọ́ àyẹ̀wò ní àwọn ilé ìwòsàn tó wà ní Gaduwa nílùú Àbújá àti LUTH tó wà nílùú Èkó.

en: Ms Naidoo said WHO has identify 13 countries of Algeria, Angola, Cote d’Ivoire, the Democratic Republic of Congo, Ethiopia, Ghana, Kenya, Mauritius, Nigeria, South Africa, Tanzania, Uganda and Zambia, which due to their direct links or high volume of travel, to China need to also increase their preparedness measures.
yor: Arábìnrin Naidoo tún sọ pé àwọn orílẹ̀ èdè mẹ́tàlá ló wà nínú ewu àrùn coronavirus, nítorí bí ọ̀pọ̀ ènìyàn ṣe ń yawọ àwọn orílẹ̀ èdè yìí, Algeria, Angola, Cote d’Ivoire, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ethiopia, Ghana, Kenya, Mauritius, Nigeria, South Africa, Tanzania, Uganda àti Zambia.

en: Also speaking at the workshop, WHO communication expert, Ms Charity Warigon, said that the workshop was aimed at acquainting the media with terms and terminology in reporting the dreaded coronavirus.
yor: Arábìnrin Charity Warigon tó jẹ́ alákòóso ẹka tó ń mójútó ètò ìròyìn ni àjọ WHO wá rọ àwọn akọ̀ròyìn láti máa ṣèwádìí ìròyìn wọn kí wọn tó gbée jáde, pàápàá jùlọ nípa ààrùn coronavirus, nítorí ìròyìn tí wọ́n bá gbé jáde ni àwọn ènìyàn máa ń gbẹ́kẹ̀le.

en: ---Germany has stated its readiness to partner with Nigeria to tackle migration issues.
yor: ---Orílẹ̀ èdè Germany ti ní ohun ṣetán láti fọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ pẹ̀lú orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà láti mójútò ìṣoro ìṣikirí.

en: The German State Minister at the Federal Chancellery and Commissioner for Migration, Refugees, and Integration, H.E. Annette Widmann-Mauz stated this when she visited Nigeria.
yor: Mínísítà ìpínlẹ̀ fún orílẹ̀ èdè Germany àti kọmísọ́nà fún ọ̀rọ̀ tó jẹ mọ́ sísá kúrò lórílẹ̀ èdè, ṣíṣe àtìpó àti ìbágbépọ̀, ọbabìnrin Annette Widmann-Mauz, ló sọ̀rọ̀ yìí lásìkò tó ṣe àbẹ̀wò sí orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà.

en: The German Minister noted that “Nigeria plays an important role as a country of origin for refugees in Germany and that’s why we need to work together as strong partners and I’m eager to see.
yor: Mínísítà ìpínlẹ̀ fún orílẹ̀ èdè Germany ní “ Orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà tí ń kó ipa pàtàkì láti ṣe àtìpò fún àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀ èdè wọn tó wà nílùú Germany, ìdí nìyí tí a ṣe fẹ́ fọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ láti bá wọn ṣe iṣẹ́ papọ̀, mo sì ní ìtara láti rí.

en: She explained that there was an urgent need to address the reason why people are fleeing the country.
yor: Ọbabìnrin tún ṣàlàyé pé, wọn yóò gbé ìgbésẹ̀ ní kíákíá láti leè wá ojútùú sí èrèdí ohun tó ń fá kí àwọn ènìyàn máa sá kúrò ní orílẹ̀ èdè wọn.

en: She added that “in order to achieve that we need strong partners and we have good and strong partners in Nigeria. Because we need to make sure that those that come back have a perspective and a future”.
yor: Ó tún tẹ̀síwájú pé “Láti leè gbé ìgbésẹ̀ nípa bí àwọn ènìyàn ṣe ń sá kúrò lórílẹ̀ èdè wọn, a nílò olùbásepọ̀ tó múná-dóko, ìdí nìyí tí a fi ní orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà tó jẹ́ alábàásisẹ́pọ̀ pẹ̀lú wa”.

en: Speaking earlier, the Commissioner of the National Commission for Refugees, Migrants, and Internally Displaced Persons IDPs, Senator Basheer Garba Mohammed stated that Nigeria is a significant country in global migration discourse.
yor: Ṣáájú èyí ni kọmísọ́nà tó ń mójútó, àtìpó, sísá kúrò lórílẹ̀ èdè àti àwọn tí ogun lé kúrò ní ibùgbé wọn, Aṣòfin Basheer Garba Mohammed náà sọ pé orílè èdè Nàìjíríà ń ṣiṣẹ́ ètò ìlànà nípa ti ìṣínípòkiri.

en: Nigerian Senate holds closed-door meeting with IGP
yor: Ilé ìgbìmọ̀ aṣòfin ń ṣe ìpàdé bòǹkẹ́lẹ́ pẹ̀lú adarí àwọn ọlọ́pàá Nàìjíríà.

en: The Senate has dedicated most of Wednesday’s plenary to tackling insecurity, and so resolved into a closed session, to enable the Inspector General of Police, Mohammmed Adamu to brief the Senate on security situation in the country.
yor: Ilé ìgbìmọ̀ aṣòfin orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà ti wà ní ìpàdé bòǹkẹ́lẹ́ pẹ̀lú adarí àwọn ọlọ́pàá orílẹ̀ èdè yìí, Mohammed Adamu láti wa sọ̀rọ̀ nípa ìṣoro tó ń dojúkọ ètò ààbò lórílẹ̀ èdè yìí.

en: ---President Muhammadu Buhari has strongly condemned the terrorist killing of Lawan Andimi, Chairman of the Christian Association of Nigeria (CAN) in Michika Local Government Area of Adamawa state, describing it as cruel, inhuman and deliberately provocative.
yor: ---Ilé-iṣẹ́ ààrẹ ti ní ìgbésẹ̀ tí ẹgbẹ́ àwọn onígbàgbọ́ Christian Association of Nigeria (CAN) gbe ́ jẹ́ ẹ̀tọ̀ gbogbo ọmọ orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà láti fi ẹ̀hónú hàn nípa èròǹgbà wọn lórí ẹ̀sìn, ìlànà iṣẹ́ àti àwùjọ.

en: In his reaction to the incident, President Buhari expressed sorrow that the terrorists went on to kill the religious leader while giving signals at the same of a willingness to set him free by releasing him to third parties.
yor: Ọlùrànwọ́ ààrẹ Buhari lórí ìròyìn àti ìkéde, Garba Shehu ní ààrẹ bá àwọn onígbàgbọ́ kẹ́dùn, bẹ́ẹ̀ sìni inú ààrẹ tún bàjẹ́ lórí bí Boko Haram ṣe pa pásítọ̀ Lawan Andimi.

en: ---The government of the United States of America has thrown its weight behind President Muhammadu Buhari’s personal commitment to the anti-corruption crusade in Nigeria.
yor: ---Ìjọba orílẹ̀ èdè Amẹ́ríkà, ti gbósùbà fún ààrẹ Buhari lórí ipa tí ó ń kó láti gbógun ti ìwà ìbàjẹ́ lórílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà.

en: In a statement issued by Morgan Ortagus, Spokesperson of the State Department at the end of the signing of the agreement between the U.S. government, the Bailiwick of Jersey, and the Government of the Federal Republic of Nigeria for the return of more than $308 million stolen by late General Sani Abacha , the US government also  pledged their commitment to continue to support all other efforts by stakeholders to combat corruption at all levels in Nigeria .
yor: Nínú àtẹ̀jáde kàn tí Morgan Ortagus, tí ó jẹ́ agbẹnusọ fún ilé-isẹ́ ọ̀telẹ̀múyẹ́ fún orílẹ̀ èdè Amẹ́ríkà kọ̀, lẹ́yìn tí ìjọba orílẹ̀ èdè Amẹ́ríkà, Bailiwick of Jersey àti ìjọba orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà tọwọ́bọ ìwé àdéhùn láti dá mílíọ́nù $308 owó ti olóògbé Sani Abacha jí kó pamọ́ sí orílẹ̀ Amẹ́ríkà padà fún orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà, orílẹ èdè Amẹ́ríkà tún ṣèlérí láti túbọ̀ máa ṣàtìlẹyìn fún orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà nípa gbígbógun ti ìwà ìbàjẹ́.

en: Senior Special Assistant on Media and Publicity to the President, Garba Shehu disclosed this on Tuesday night via a presidency statement.
yor: Olùrànwọ́ ààrẹ Buhari lórí ìròyìn àti ìkéde, Garba Shehu ló sọ̀rọ̀ yìí lásàálẹ́ ọjọ́ Ìsẹ́gun nínú ìwé àtẹ̀jáde kàn.

en: ---President Buhari mourns former Kenyan leader Moi
yor: ---Ààrẹ Muhammadu Buhari kẹ́dùn ikú ààrẹ orílẹ̀ èdè Kenya tẹ́lẹ̀rí, Arap Moi.

en: President Muhammadu Buhari has described the late former President of Kenya, Daniel Arap Moi as a frontline nationalist who gave his best for the development of his country.
yor: Ààrẹ Muhammadu Buhari ti sàpéjúwe ààrẹ orílẹ̀ èdè Kenya tẹ́lẹ̀rí, Daniel Arap Moi gẹ́gẹ́ bí asíwájú rere , tí ó fi ohun gbogbo tí ó dára jùlọ fún ìdàgbàsókè orílẹ̀ èdè rẹ̀.

en: He said Moi was a key factor in the stability of the East African region and Africa in general.
yor: Ó ní Moi jẹ́ ọ̀kan pàtàkì nínú àwọn tó jẹ́ kí ìdàgbàsókè bá ẹkùn ìlà oòrùn Áfíríkà.

en: Condoling with President Uhuru Kenyatta, the government and the people of Kenya, President Buhari said: “From a humble beginning (as a school teacher), the late Arap Moi became a politician, a committed democrat, was elected President.
yor: Ààrẹ tún bá ààrẹ orílẹ̀ èdè Kenya, Uhuru Kenyatta, ìjọba àti àwọn ènìyàn orílẹ̀ èdè Kenya kẹ́dùn lórí ikú olóògbé náà, Ààrẹ Buhari ní: “Láti ìdílé tí kò rí ọwọ́ họrí (ó jẹ́ olùkọ́), olóògbé Arap Moi di olósèlú, kí ó tó di ààrẹ orílẹ̀ èdè náà.

en: He prays that God Almighty will repose his soul.
yor: Ààrẹ wá gbàdúrà pé kí ọlọ́run tẹ́ olóògbé náà sí afẹ́fẹ́ ire.

en: ---Minister says Nigeria media environment, one of the freest
yor: ---Mínísítà sọ wípé ìgbóhùn sáfẹ́fẹ́ èdè Nàíjíríà, ọ̀kan nínú ohun tó ní òmìnira jùlọ.

en: The Nigerian government says it runs one of the freest press environments in the world.
yor: Ìjọba orílẹ̀ èdè Nàíjíríà ti ní orílẹ̀ èdè yìí ló fi ààyè gba òmìnira nípa ọ̀rọ̀ sísọ jù fún àwọn ènìyàn ní àgbáyé.

en: The government said even though it has provided enough space for freedom, it was still expecting such freedom to be enjoyed with responsibility.
yor: Ìjọba ní bó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà fún àwọn ènìyàn ni òmìnira láti leè sọ ọ̀rọ̀ tó bá wù wọ́n, púpọ̀ nínú wọn ni kò mọ ẹ̀tọ́ rẹ nípa ọ̀rọ̀ sísọ.

en: Sanitisation of social media Nigeria’s minister of Information and Culture, Mr. Lai Mohammed also said his ministry would this month, convene a stakeholders’ meeting as part of efforts to design a framework for the sanitisation of the Social Media.
yor: Mínísítà fún ìròyìn àti àṣà lórílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà, Lai Mohammed, ló sọ̀rọ̀ yìí lọ́jọ́ Ajé nígbà tí ó ń gba aṣojú orílẹ̀ èdè Finland, Jyrki Pulkkinen, àti aláákóso tó ń mójútó ọ̀rọ̀ ilẹ̀ òkèèrè ní ẹka ètò ọgbọ́n àtinúdá fún orílẹ̀ Finland, Jarmo Sareva, wá sí ilé-isẹ́ rẹ̀ fún ìpolongo òmìnira ọ̀rọ̀ sísọ.

en: The Minister stated this in Abuja on Monday when he received the Finnish Ambassador to Nigeria, Dr. Jyrki Pulkkinen, and the Ambassador of Innovation of the Foreign Affairs Ministry of Finland, Mr. Jarmo Sareva, who were on an advocacy visit to promote the ideals of the Freedom Online Coalition.
yor: Mínísítà tún sọ pé àjọ tó ń mójútó ètò ìròyìn àti àsà yóò se ìpàdé pọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn tọ́rọ̀ọ́kàn lósù yìí láti ṣe àgbéyẹ̀wò ẹ̀tọ́ nípa lílo ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ayélujára, lọ́nà tí wọn kò fi ní tẹ òmìnira nípa ọ̀rọ̀ sísọ àti ẹ̀tọ́ ọmọnìyàn mọ́lẹ̀.

en: He said the government was responding to the irresponsible use of the Social Media to promote fake news and hate speech by some unscrupulous individuals.
yor: Ó ní inú ìjọba orílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà kò dùn si bí àwọn kàn se ń lo ìmọ̀ ayélujára láti fi gbé àwọn ìròyìn ẹlẹ́jẹ̀ àti ọ̀rọ̀ tó leè dá wàhálà sílẹ̀ jáde láti fa èdè àìyedè.

en: ---APC governors to submit Constitutional Amendment Bill to National Assembly
yor: ---Gómìnà ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú APC yóò fi àtúnṣe ètò òfin ránsẹ́ sí ilé ìgbìmọ̀ aṣòfin.

en: Governors of the All Progressives Congress, APC under the platform of the Progressive Governors Forum, PGF are studying areas for constitutional amendment which they will submit to the National Assembly.
yor: Àwọn gómìnà ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú APC, lábẹ́ igbimọ gómìnà tó ń mójútó ètò ìtẹ́síwájú fún àwọn gómìnà, Progressive Governors Forum, PGF ti ń ṣe àgbéyẹ̀wò òfin láti ṣe àtúnṣe sí ètò òfin tí  yóò mú ìgbáyé-gbádùn àti ìṣèjọba rere bá gbogbo ìpínlẹ̀ lórílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà, ní èyí tí wọ́n yóò fi ránsẹ́ sí ilé ìgbìmọ̀ asòfin.

en: Edo state governor Godwin Obaseki who was represented by his deputy Mr. Philip Shuaibu stated this while briefing journalists in Abuja after a meeting of the PGF Steering Committee on Good Governance.
yor: Philip Shuaibu tó jẹ́ aṣojú gómìnà ìpínlẹ̀ Edo Godwin Obaseki ló sọ̀rọ̀ yìí lásìkò tó ń bá àwọn akọ̀ròyìn sọ̀rọ̀ nílùú Àbújá, lẹ́yìn ìpàdé tí ìgbìmọ̀ PGF ṣe.

en: He said the committee will study the report of governor Nasir El-Rufai-led committee on restructuring and draw out the areas that need amendments from the report.
yor: Ó tún tẹ̀síwájú pé ìgbìmọ̀ ọ̀hún yóò yẹ ìwé àkọsílẹ̀ tí gómìnà ìpínlẹ̀ Kaduna Nasir El-Rufai kọ̀, lásìkò tí ó ń darí ìgbìmọ̀ tó ń ṣàgbéyẹ̀wò àtúnṣe òfin.

en: Mr Shuaibu added that the PGF is working on better synergy between the APC governors, legislators and the party in order to better drive the party’s manifesto and good governance in their various states.
yor: Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Shuaibu tún sọ pé ìgbìmọ̀ náà ń ṣe iṣẹ́ papọ̀ pẹ̀lú gbogbo àwọn gómìnà tí ó wà nínú ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú APC, àwọn ìgbìmọ̀ aṣòfin àti ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú ọ̀hún láti leè ṣe àwọn ètò àti ìlànà tí yóò mú ìgbáyé-gbádùn bá gbogbo ìpínlẹ̀ tó wà lórílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà.

en: Senate Leader, Yahaya Abdullahi who was at the meeting said a sub-committee has been set up to come up with key areas from the El-Rufai report that would require legislative action especially in areas of good governance both at the state and federal levels.
yor: Ọ̀kan lára ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ilé ìgbìmọ̀ asòfin, Yahaya Abdullahi, tó wà níbi ìpàdé ọ̀hún, tún sọ pé ìgbìmọ̀ tẹ̀ẹ́kótó náà yóò sàgbéyẹ̀wò ìwé àkọsílẹ̀ tí El-Rufai kọ, ní èyí tí ilé ìgbìmọ̀ aṣòfin yóò fẹnukò lé lórí pàápàá júlọ nípa ètò ìgbáyé-gbádùn àti ìṣèjọba rere lórílẹ̀ èdè Nàìjíríà.

en: --- Anthony Joshua discussed on the venue of competing with Jarrell Miller
yor: --- Anthony Joshua ń jíròrò lórí ibi ìgbáradì ṣaájú ìfigagbága pẹ̀lú Jarrell Miller.

en: Now, the Britain boxer, Antony Joshua is having a meeting on which field to practice before competiting with the New York boxer, Jarrell Miller in a combat for the world cup.
yor: Ní báyìí, ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ẹ́ ọmọ ilẹ̀ Bìrìtìkó, Anthony Joshua ti ń ṣe ìpàdé lórí gbàgede ìgbáradì tí yóò lò kí ó tó lọ kojú ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ẹ́ ilẹ̀ New York, Jarrell Miller nínú ìtakàǹgbọ̀n fún àmì-ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé.

en: Though, Anthony Joshua at not t any time relaxed, afte his longtime preparation for the competition.
yor: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, Anthony Joshua kò fìgbà kankan túra sílẹ̀, lẹ́yìn ìgbáradì ọlọ́jọ́ pípẹ́ fún ìfigagbága náà.

en: The News established it that, Joshua is waiting for an assurance of the competition between himself and Miller at the Madison Square June this year.
yor: Ìròyìn fi ìdí rẹ̀ múlẹ̀ pé, Joshua ń dúró de àrídájú ìfigagbága náà láàrín òun àti Miller ní gbàgede Madison Square, nínú oṣù kẹfà ọdún yìí.

en: Also his losing counterpart Eddie Hearn had a meeting with Dillian Whyte on maybe the competition between them will be restaged.
yor: Bákan náà ni, akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ tí ó pàdánù, Eddie Hearn ṣe ìpàdé pẹ̀lú Dillian Whyte lórí bóyá ìfigagbága wọn yóò di àtúngbékalẹ̀.

en: --- Martial extends his term in Manchester United.
yor: --- Martial sún àkókò rẹ̀ síwájú nínú ikọ̀ Manchester United.

en: The French scorer, Anthony Martial who is player of Manchester United has signed a five years work agreement to extend his his term in Manchester United till 2024.
yor: Atamátàsé ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè France, Anthony Martial tí ó jẹ́ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ikọ̀ Manchester United ti buwọ́ lu ìwé àdéhùn ìṣiṣẹ́ ọlọ́dún márùn-ún láti sún àkókò rẹ̀ síwájú nínú ikọ̀ Manchester United di ọdún 2024.

en: Though, different rumour is on in the market that it is possible that the football athlete will leave Manchester United.
yor: Bí ó ti lẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, oríṣiríṣi àhesọ ọ̀rọ̀ ló gba ojú-ọjà kan pé, ó ṣeéṣe kí agbábọ́ọ̀lù náà ó kúrò nínú ikọ̀ Manchester United.

en: Now, Martial has scored a total of ten goals in this season and help for a goal in twenty five (25) football match in this season.
yor: Ní báyìí, Martial ti gbá àpapọ̀ bọ́ọ̀lù mẹ́wàá sáwọ̀n ní sáà yìí, tí ó sì ṣe ìrànwọ́ ayọ̀ kan nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ márùndínlọ́gbọ̀n ní sáà yìí.

en: Many of the footballers commend the acting coaching for Manchester Unuted, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer for his hard work and the part played since he has substituted the former coach of the football club Jose Mourinho.
yor: Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ nínú àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọ̀hún ni ó gbóríyìn fún adelé akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Manchester United, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer fún iṣẹ́ takuntakun àti ipa tí ó kó láti ìgbà tí ó ti rọ́pò akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ náà tẹ́lẹ̀, Jose Mourinho.

en: According to Martial, I thank Ole so much and the other coaches for the their believe in me, because they helped me so much to bring increase to how I participated.
yor: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Martial ṣe sọ, Mo dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ Ole gidi gan àti àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá yòókù fún ìgbàgbọ́ wọn nínú mi, nítorí pé wọ́n rànmí lọ́wọ́ púpọ̀ láti mú ìgbèrú bá bí mo ṣe ń kópa sí.

en: We know Manchester United football club in the past as football club that love to win the trouphy, I am so sure that very soon we will win the trouphy.
yor: A mọ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Manchester United sẹ́yìn gẹ́gẹ́ bí, ikọ̀ tí ó nífẹ̀ẹ́ láti máa gba ife ẹ̀yẹ lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀, ó dá mi lójú pé, láìpẹ́ a ó tún gba ife ẹ̀yẹ.

en: Anthony Martial joined Manchester United in 2015 from Monaco football club for thirty six million Euro (£36 million or $47m) , since then he has been seing himself has one of the best young footballer.
yor: "Anthony Martial dara pọ̀ mọ́ Manchester United lọ́dún 2015 láti inú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Monaco pẹ̀lú mílíọ́nù mẹ́rìndínlógójì £36 million ($47m), láti ìgbà náà ni ó ti ń rí ara rẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀kan lára agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọ̀dọ́ tí ó dára jùlọ.

en: The club football coach, Solskjaer also show his displeasure after Martial signed an agreement with the club.
yor: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ ọ̀hún, Solskjaer náà fi àìdùnnú rẹ̀ hàn lẹ́yìn tí Martial tún buwọ́ lu ìwé àdéhùn nínú ikọ̀ náà.

en: Anthony is one of the young best football players for the club, and a player that any coach will love to have in his team, because he is easy to work with
yor: Anthony wà lára agbábọ́ọ̀lu ọ̀dọ́ tí ó dára jùlọ fún ikọ̀ náà, ó sì jẹ́ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá yòówù yóò nífẹ̀ẹ́ láti ní nínú ikọ̀ rẹ̀, nítorí pé, ó rọrùn láti bá ṣiṣẹ́pọ̀,"

en: --- Sarri-  I am not stopping Hazard if he want to go.
yor: --- Sarri- Mi ò dí Hazard lọ́wọ́ tó bá fẹ́ lọ

en: Chelsea football club coach, Maurizio Sarri made Eden Hazard to know that he is not stopping him if he decided to be going.
yor: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea, Maurizio Sarri ti jẹ́ kí Eden Hazard mọ̀ pé òun kò dá a dúró, tí ó bá pinnu láti máa lọ.

en: Sarri said truly he wanted Hazzard to remain in Chelsea, but he wil not stop him if he want to leave the football club.
yor: Sarri sọ pé lòótọ́ òun fẹ́ kí Hazard ó ṣì wà nínú ikọ̀ Chelsea, ṣùgbọ́n òun kò ní dí i lọ́wọ́ tí ó bá fẹ́ fi ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù náà sílẹ̀.

en: Remembering that Real Madrid Football club had wanted Hazard to join her club in Spain.
yor: A ó rántí pé, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lu Real Madrid ti ń fẹ́ ki Hazard ó dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ ọ̀hún ní orílẹ̀-èdè Spain.

en: And Hazard himself has said he love to join Resl Madrid, if the club is ready to buy him over.
yor: Tí Hazard fúnra rẹ̀ ti sọ pe ó wu òun láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ Real Madrid, bí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún bá ṣetán láti ra òun.

en: Now Chelsea football club want Hazard to sign an agreement  before the former agreement will lapse next year.
yor: Ní báyìí, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea fẹ́ kí Hazard tọwọ́ bọ ìwé àdéhùn tuntun kí àdéhùn tilẹ̀ ó tó tán lọ́dún tó ń bọ̀.

en: Hazard joined Chelsea in 2012 and scored a total of ten goals for chealsea in the premier league this season.
yor: Hazard dara pọ̀ mọ́ Chelsea lọ́dun 2012, ó sì ti gbá àpapọ̀ ayò mẹ́wàá sáwọ̀n fún ikọ̀ Chelsea nínú ìdíjé premier league ti sáà yìí.

en: --- Dream Stars Ladies unveils new Head Coach
yor: --- Ikọ̀ agbábòọ̀lù obìnrin Dream Stars ṣàfihàn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tuntun.

en: The team, Dream Stars Ladies of Lagos has unveiled new Head Coach, Felix Nwosu, ahead of the 2018/2019 Nigeria Women Premier League season.
yor: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù obìnrin Dream Stars ti ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó ti ṣàfihàn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà tuntun, ọ̀gbẹ́ni Felix Nwosu, ṣaájú ìdíje sáà 2018/2019 ìdíje Líìgì àwọn obìnrin orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà.

en: The newly promoted Lagos based team has finalised the appointment of the widely travelled Anambra born coach.
yor: Ikọ̀ tí ó fi ìlú ẹ̀kọ́ ṣe ibùgbé tí ó sì ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ gba ìgbéga ọ̀hún nìgbẹ̀yìngbéyín ti gba ìlúmọ̀ọ́ká akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ọmọ bíbí ìpínlẹ̀ Anambra yìí.

en: Felix Nwosu is an experienced coach who has stints with FC Talanta Kenya, Heegan FC Somali, FIN FA Enugu, FIN Angels, Ambassador Child Youth Club /Angels Enugu.
yor: Felix Nwosu jẹ́ òjìmì akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tí ó ti ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ FC Talanta lórílẹ̀-èdè Kenya, Heegan FC ní Somali, FIN FA nílùú Enugu, FIN Angels, Ambassador Child Youth Club /Angels nílùú Enugu rí.

en: Nomination He was nominated and recognised by Arsenal FC/ WorldRemit amongst the best 25 Youth coaches across Africa in a pool of over 700 coaches.
yor: Nínú ìfanikalẹ̀ fun àmì ẹ̀yẹ, ó jẹ́ fífàkalẹ̀ àti kíkàsí láti lọ́wọ́ ikọ̀ Arsenal/ilé iṣẹ́ WorldRemit gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀kan lára àwọn akọ́nímọ́ọ̀gbá ọ̀dọ́ tí ó dáńgájíá jùlọ jákè-jádò ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀, ó wà lára akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá márùndínlọ́gbọ̀n àkọ́kọ́ nínú àpapọ̀ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tí ó lé ní ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́gbẹ̀rin

en: Dream Stars Ladies Chairman, Mr AbdulRahmon Abolore said; “the club opted for Nwosu because of his wealth of experience and he is confident that the former Gor Mahia defender can help the club achieve its objectives.
yor: Ẹni tí ó jẹ́ Alága ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Dream Stars Ladies, Ọ̀gbẹ́ni AbdulRahmon Àbọ̀lọrẹ sọ pé; “Ikọ̀ náà yà sí Nwosu torí àgbọ́ǹgbẹ ìrírí tí ó ní àti pé ó dá òun lójú pé agbábòọ̀lù ọwọ́ ẹ̀yin ikọ̀ Gor Mahia tẹ́lẹ̀rí ọ̀hún lè ṣe ìrànwọ́ fún ikọ̀ náà láti sọ èròńgbà rẹ̀ di mímúṣẹ.

en: “Our aim is to make the best out of our promotion to the Premier League and we don’t want to leave any stone unturned.”
yor: “Àfojúsùn wa ni láti kópa dáradára pẹ̀lú ìgbéga wa yìí sí inú ìdíje líìgì, a kò sì fẹ́ da òkuta kan sí láìbì lulẹ̀.

en: --- There is no assurance of recovering Emiliano Sala that was missing.
yor: --- Kò sí ìdánilójú ìṣàwárí Emiliano Sala tó di àwáàrí.

en: The senior officer of the commission in charge of emergencies and missing aircraft in island, Mr. John Fitzgerald has said there is no hope that Sala will be recorvered.
yor: Ọ̀gá àgbà ilé-iṣẹ́ tó ń rí sí ìṣẹ̀lè pàjáwìrì àti ọkọ̀ òfurufú tí ó bá di àwáti sórí erékùsù, Ọ̀gbẹ́ni John Fitzgerald ti sọ pé, kò sí ìrètí pé Sala yóò di ṣíṣàwárí mọ́.

en: Emiliano Sala an Argentine, who is twenty eight (28) years old was with a pilot in a air plane that got missing yesterday Monday.
yor: Emiliano Sala ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Argentina, tó jẹ́ ẹni ọdún méjìdínlọ́gbọ̀n wà pẹ̀lú awakọ̀ òfurufú nínú ọkọ̀ bàálù kan tí ó di àwátì lánàá ọjọ́ ajé (Monday).

en: Furthermore, the rescue team has continued in the search for the missing airplane and the passengers on Wednesday.
yor: Ṣíwájú si, ikọ̀ adóòlà ẹ̀mí ti tẹ̀síwájú nínú wíwá ọkọ̀ òfúrufú náà àti àwọn èrò inú rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́rú (Wednesday).

en: An information said that Sala send a internet whatsapp message to a friend his family, that he was scared with the way the airplane is moving in air.
yor: Ìròyìn kán fi léde pé Sala fi àtẹ̀jíṣẹ́ ẹ̀rọ ayélujára whatsapp ránṣẹ́ sí ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀ kan àti àwọn mọ̀lẹ́bí pé Ẹ̀rù ń ba òun pẹ̀lú bí ọkọ̀ òfúrufú náà ṣe ń ṣe lójú ofurufú.

en: According to a reporter from Argentina, Sala told his family that ‘ I am in an air plane that is like it want to crash.
yor: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ilé-iṣẹ́ akọ̀ròyìn l’orílẹ̀-èdè Argentina ṣe sọ, Sala sọ fún àwọn mọ̀lẹ́bí rẹ̀ báyìí pé "Mo wà nínú ọkọ̀ òfurufú kan tó dàbí ẹni pé ó fẹ́ ní ìjàm̀bá.

en: Now around 11:30 am, Guernsey police command said, the three aircrafts  and a small airplane were in the air,as Piper Malibu is been searched for.
yor: Wàyíí o ní nǹkan bí aago mọ́kànlá ààbọ̀ òwúrọ̀, ile-iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá ni Guernsey sọ pé, ọkọ̀ òfúrufú mẹ́ta àti bàálù kékeré kan wà lójú òfurufú, bí wọ́n ṣe ń wá bàálù Piper Malibu.

en: Also, the policemen said they are checking the phone conversatiions if it can be of help.
yor: Bákan náà ni àwọn ọlọ́pàá sọ pé àwọn ti ń ṣàyẹ̀wò àwọn ìtàkùrọ̀sọ orí ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ láti mọ̀ bóyá ó lè ṣe ìrànwọ́

en: But till now,there is no news about the missing plane.
yor: Ṣùgbọ́n títí di àsìkò yìí, kò tí ì sí ìròyìn kankan nípa bàálù tó di àwáti ọ̀hún

en: Sala is going to the capital city of Welsh after he has signed a contract of fifteen million pound with Bluebirds football team.
yor: Olú ìlú orílẹ̀-èdè Welsh ni Sala ń lọ lẹ́yìn tó bọwọ́lu ìwé àdéhùn iṣẹ́ mílíọ́nù mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dógún owó pounds pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Bluebirds.

en: --- Arsenal’s Petr Cech set to retire end of season
yor: --- Petr Cech ti ikọ̀ Arsenal ṣetán àti fẹ̀yìntì nípàrí sáà yìí.

en: After 20 years as a professional, Arsenal’s first choice goalkeeper Petr Cech is set to retire at the end of the 2018/2019 English Premier League (EPL) season.
yor: Lẹ́yìn ogún ọdún gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́, Amùlé àkọ́kọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Arsenal Petr Cech ti ṣetán láti fẹ̀yìntì ní ìparí sáà 2018/2019 ìdíje Premier League ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì.

en: The 36-year-old who joined Arsenal in June 2015 from Chelsea announced this on his twitter handle @petrcech on Tuesday.
yor: Ọmọ ọdún mẹ́rìndínlògòjì ọ̀hún tí ó dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ Arsenal ní oṣù kẹfà ọdùn 2015 láti ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea kéde èyí lóri ìkànnì twitter rẹ̀ @petrcech ní ọjọ́ ìṣégun.

en: “This is my 20thseason as a professional player and it has been 20 years since I signed my first professional contract.
yor: “Èyí ni sáà ogún mi gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ agbábọ́ọ̀lù, ó sì ti pé ogún ọdún tí mo tọwọ́ bọ ìwé àdéhùn mi àkọ́kọ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́.

en: --- Omeruo to welcome permanent move to CD Leganes
yor: --- Omeruo- máa nífẹ̀ẹ́ láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù CD Leganes fún àdéhùn ọlọ́jọ́ pípẹ́.

en: Super Eagles defender, Kenneth Omeruo has said that he will welcome his loan move if it is made permanent at CD Leganes because the La Liga club feel very much like home.
yor: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ ẹ̀yìn ikọ̀ Super Eagles, Kenneth Omeruo ti sọ pé òun yóò gba sìsọ àdéhùn àyálò òun di àdéhùn ọjọ́ pípẹ́ nínú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù CD Leganes ní tọwọ́-tẹsẹ́ nítorí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ìdíje La Liga ọ̀hún rí bí ilé.

en: Omeruo is on loan from Chelsea till the end of the season and he has already established himself at Leganes, who have done well so far to stay clear of the relegation pack.
yor: Omeruo wà nínú àdéhùn aláyàálò láti inú ikọ̀ Chelsea di ìparí sáà yìí, ó sì ti di ará ilé nínú ikọ̀ Leganes ọ̀hún tí ó ṣe dára gidi gan láti jìnnà sí ìfìdírẹmi.

en: “Right now, I feel more at home, having been tossed up and down on different loans deals before arriving at the Spanish side,” the Super Eagles defender opened up to media.
yor: “Ní báyìí, o dà bí ẹni pé mo wà ní ilé lẹ́yìn títì káàkiri pẹ̀lú oríṣìíríṣìí àdéhùn aláyàálò kí n tó dé inú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè Spain yìí.” Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ ẹ̀yìn ikọ̀ Super Eagles ọ̀hún ló sọ èyí di mímọ̀ fún àwọn oníròyìn.

en: it’s more like a dream come true for me knowing full well La Liga is rated as one of the biggest leagues in the world.
yor: Ó dá bí àlá tí ó wá sí ìmúṣe fún mi gẹ́gẹ́ bí a ṣe mọ̀ pé ìdíje La Liga jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwọn ìdíje tí ó tóbi jùlọ lágbàáyé

en: “I will not hesitate to sign the dotted lines for the Spanish side if the opportunity comes.”
yor: Mi ò ní rò ó lẹ́ẹ̀mejì láti tọwọ́ bọ ìwé pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ yìí, tí oore-ọ̀fẹ rẹ̀ bá yọ.

en: The modest Madrid club will have to shell out five million Euros to sign Omeruo, 25, on a permanent basis in the summer.
yor: "Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ìlú Madrid ọ̀hún yóò ní láti ya mílíọ́nù márùn-ún owó Euros sọ́tọ̀ láti ra Omeruo ọmọ ọdún mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dọ́gbọ̀n fún àdehùn ọlọ́jọ́ pípẹ́.

en: --- NFF confirms Keshi Stadium for Seychelles, Egypt matches
yor: --- Àjọ NFF yan pápá ìṣeré Keshi fún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ Seychelles àti Egypt.

en: The Nigeria Football Federation (NFF) is believed to have settled for the  Keshi Stadium in Asaba, Delta State to host the international friendly between the Super Eagles and the Pharaohs of Egypt and the dead-rubber last 2019 African Cup of Nations qualifying Group B match  against Seychelles.
yor: Àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà (NFF) ni ìgbàgbọ́ wà pé wọ́n ti yan pápá ìṣeré Keshi ní ìlú Asaba, ìpìnlẹ́ Delta láti gbàlejò ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́sọ́rẹ̀ẹ́ àgbááyé láàrin ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles àti ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Pharaoh ti orílẹ̀-èdè Egypt tí ó fi mọ́ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìpegedé kẹyìn fún ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ọdún 2019 tí wọn yóò gbá pẹ̀lú orílẹ̀-èdè Seychelles.

en: A top official in the Glass House in Abuja said that the deal to host the two matches in Asaba is almost a done deal because the Delta State Government has agreed to take 70 per cent of the cost to prosecute the matches.
yor: Àgbà ọ̀jẹ̀ kan ní Olú ilé-iṣẹ́ àjọ NFF nílùú Àbújá sọ ọ́ yanya pé, aáyan láti gbàlejò àwọn ìdíje méjéèjì ní ìlú Àsàbà ti fẹ́ yọrí nítorí pé ìjọba ìpínlẹ̀ Delta ti gbà láti gbé ìdá àádọ́rin nínú ọgọ́rùn-ún iye owó tí àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọsẹ̀ ọ̀hún yóò ná wọn.

en: “We have reached the final phase of discussion and all seem to be done deal as the Asaba stadium will stage the matches all things been equal,” he said.
yor: “A ti dé abala ìkẹyìn ìjíròrò wa, gbogbo ètó sì ti tò pẹ̀lú bí pápá ìṣeré Asaba yóò ṣe gbàlejò àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà tí gbogbo nǹkan yóò sì ṣe yémú.” ni ó wí.

en: The international match against Egypt will attract top players like Mohammed Salah of Liverpool FC, Mohammed El-Shenawy and Ahmed Hegazi.
yor: "Ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́sọ́rẹ̀ẹ́ pẹ̀lụ́ Egypt yóò ní àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù jàǹkànjàǹkàn bí i Mohammed Salah ti ikọ̀ Liverpool, Mohammed El-Shenawy àti Ahmed Hegazi.

en: The Governor Ifeanyi Okowa administration is said to be passionate about sports tourism and a visit of the top English Premiership star will be a big boost to Asaba and neighboring towns within the state.
yor: Ìsèjọba Gómínà Ifeanyi Okowa ti jẹ́ èyí tí ó nífẹ̀ẹ́ ìrìn-àjò ìgbafẹ́ eré ìdárayá, bákan náà ni àbẹ̀wò àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù jàǹkànjàǹkàn ìdíje Premiership ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì náà yóò mú ìgbèrú bá ọrọ̀ ajé ìlú Asaba àti àwọn ìlú agbègbè rẹ̀ ní àárín ìpínlẹ̀ náà.

en: --- Egypt favourite to host 2019 AFCON
yor: --- Orílẹ̀-èdè Egypt ni ààyò láti gbàlejò ìdíje AFCON ti ọdún 2019.

en: Egypt, the land of Pyramids is the likely host for the 2019 Africa Cup of Nations, CAF sources have hinted and by all indications the rest of the continent could be heading back to that football crazy nation next year.
yor: Orílẹ̀-ẹ̀dè Egypt, ilẹ̀ onígun aborí sóńsó ni ó ṣeéṣe kí ó gbàlejò ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ti ọdún 2019, Àjọ CAF ti fi léde pé àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tó ku ní ilẹ̀ náà lè sẹ́rí lọ sí orílẹ̀-èdè tí kì í fi eré bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá ṣeré ọ̀hún ní ọdún tó ń bọ̀.

en: The last time Egypt hosted the Africa Cup of Nations, the Super Eagles finished third; a third consecutive bronze medal at three straight editions.
yor: Ní ìgbà kẹyìn tí orílẹ̀-èdè Egypt gbàlejò ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀, ikọ̀ Super Eagle parí pẹ̀lú ipò kẹta; pẹ̀lú gbígba àmì ẹ̀yẹ bàbà fún ìgbà kẹta léra wọn nínú ìdíje ọ̀hún mẹ́ta ní tèléǹtẹ̀lé.

en: According to sources, CAF is ready to rule in favor of Egypt’s bid to host the 2019 AFCON.
yor: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìròyin ṣe sọ, Àjọ CAF ti ṣetán láti sègbè ìfẹ́ orílẹ̀-èdè Egypt láti gbàlejò ìdíje AFCON ọdún 2019.

en: AFCON President Amaju Pinnick explained that the Confederation would only consider bids from countries with the ability to host the competition.
yor: Ààrẹ ìgbìmọ̀ tó ń mójú tó ìdíje AFCON, Amaju Pinnick ṣe é lálàyé pé, àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí agbára wọ́n gbé àtigbàlejò ìdíje náà nìkan ni ìgbìmọ̀ àwọn yóò wò ṣe.

en: CAF will announce the new hosts for the 2019 AFCON on January 9.
yor: Àjọ CAF yóò kéde orílẹ̀-èdè tí yóò gbàlejò ìdíje AFCON ọdún 2019 ọ̀hún ní ọjọ́ kẹsàn-án oṣù kínní ọdún.

en: --- Mbappe wins French player of the year
yor: --- Mbappe gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè France tí ó dára jùlọ.

en: Paris Saint-Germain forward, Kylian Mbappe, has been crowned French Player of the Year for the first time.
yor: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ iwájú ikọ̀ Paris Saint-Germain, Kylian Mbappe ti gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ  agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè France tí ó dára jùlọ fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́

en: The 20-year-old forward who was pivotal to France winning the World Cup in Russia last summer enjoyed a remarkable 2018.
yor: Ọmọ ogún ọdún ọ̀hún tí ó kópa ribiribi fún orílẹ̀-èdè France láti gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje àgbàáyé lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia ní sáà tó kọjá gbádun mérìírí ọdun 2018 yìí.

en: Mbappe helped Les Bleus to go all the way, with a fine individual effort netted in a 4-2 final triumph over Croatia.
yor: Mbappe ran ikọ̀ Les Bleus ọ̀hún lọ́wọ́ láti wẹ̀ yán kànhìnkànhìn pẹ̀lú àkitiyan àdáṣiṣẹ́ kára tí ó fi rí àwọ̀n he nínú ìjáwé olúborí àṣekágbá àmi ayò mẹ́rin sí méjì pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Croatia.

en: Mbappe has hit 16 goals in 19 appearances for PSG this season, as they continue to chase down more trophies at home and abroad.
yor: Mbappe ti gbá bọ́ọ̀lù mẹ́rìndínlógún sáwọ̀n nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ mọ́kàndínlógún tí ó ti gbá fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù PSG ní sáà yìí, pẹ̀lú bí ikọ̀ náà tún ṣe ń tẹ̀síwájú láti máa lépa ife ẹ̀yẹ nílé àti lẹ́yìn odi.

en: He finished fourth in the vote for the 2018 Ballon d’Or, with that lofty standing placing him above five-time winner Lionel Messi.
yor: Ó parí pẹ̀lú ipò kẹrin nínú àbájáde ìdìbò àmì ẹ̀yẹ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó dára jùlọ lágbàáyé lọ́dún 2018, pẹ̀lú ipò gíga yìí gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọmọ kékeré, èyí gbé e ṣaájú Lionel Messi Agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó ti gba àmì ẹyẹ ọ̀hún lẹ́ẹ̀marùn-ún ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀.

en: Mbappe was awarded that gong by France Football, having edged out Raphael Varane and Antoine Griezmann.
yor: Mbappe jẹ́ fífún ní apata yìí láti ọ̀wọ́ Àjọ Eré Bọ́ọ̀lù ilẹ̀ France, lẹ́yìn tí ó ta Raphael Varane àti Antoine Griezmann  yọ.

en: He inherits the title from Chelsea midfielder N’Golo Kante, who came out on top in 2017.
yor: Ó jogún àmì ẹ̀yẹ yìí lọ́wọ́ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ àárín ikọ̀ Chelsea, NGolo Kante, tí ó mókè jùlọ lọ́dún 2017.

en: --- President Weah’s striker son to join Celtic on loan
yor: ---Atamátàsé Ọmọ Ààrẹ Weah yóò dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Celtic pẹ̀lú àyálò.

en: Timothy Weah will leave French champions Paris St Germain (PSG) on loan to join Scottish champions Celtic.
yor: Timothy Weah yóò kúrò nínú ikọ̀ aṣáájú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù ilẹ̀ Faransé nnì Paris St Germain (PSG), láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ Celtic ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ilẹ̀ Scotland.

en: Weah said on Tuesday.
yor: Weah sọ ọ́ di mímọ̀ lọ́jọ́ ìṣẹ́gun (Tuesday).

en: British media reported that the 18-year-old was set to join Scottish champions Celtic.
yor: Gẹ́gẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ ìròyìn ilẹ̀ Bìrìtìkó ṣe sọ, ọmọ ọdún méjìdínlógún ọ̀hún ti ṣetán láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ aṣáájú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù ilẹ̀ Scotland ìyẹn Celtic.

en: Weah has played only three times for PSG this season as bigger names such as Neymar, Kylian Mbappe and Edinson Cavani have limited his first-team chances.
yor: Weah ti kópa fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù PSG nígbà mẹ́ta pére ní sáà yìí, látàrí àwọn olórúkọ sàǹkò bíi Neymar, Kylian Mbappe àti Edinson Cavani tí ó dín oore-ọ̀fẹ́ àtiwọ ikọ̀ àkọ́kọ́ rẹ̀ kù.

en: In a message posted in French on his Instagram page, Weah thanked his PSG team mates, the coaching staff and supporters for making him feel part of the family.
yor: Nínú àtẹ̀jíṣẹ́ tí a kọ lédè Faransé lórí ìkànnì Instagram rẹ̀, Weah dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ àwọn àkẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ nínú ikọ̀ PSG, àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àti àwọn olólùfé ikọ̀ náà fún àǹfààní tí wọ́n fún un láti jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára ẹ̀bí náà.

en: Weah is the son of former Liberia, PSG and AC Milan striker, George Weah who is now the President of Liberia
yor: Weah jẹ́ ọmọbíbí inú agbábọ́ọ̀lù tẹ́lẹ̀rí fún orílẹ̀-èdè Liberia, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù PSG àti AC Milan, George Weah, tí ó jẹ́ Ààrẹ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Liberia báyìí.

en: --- this are the breakdown of the EPL competition over the weekend.
yor: --- Èyí ni àtúpalẹ̀ àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìdíje EPL tí ó wáyé lópin ọ̀sẹ̀.

en: Crystal Palace football team lead Manchester City with three (3) goals to two (2) in the English premier league over the weekend.
yor: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Crytsal Palace fàgbà han Manchester City pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́ta sí méjì nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìdíje premier league ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì tí ó wáyé lópin ọ̀sẹ̀.

en: Also Leicester city defeated Chelsea with One (1) goal to nothing.
yor: Bákan náà, ikọ̀ agbábọ̀ọ̀lu Leicester City fẹ̀yìn Chelsea bẹ́lẹ̀ pẹ̀lú àmì ayò kan sí òdo.

en: Ealier in the first competiton that came up on Saturday, Arsenal football team wins Burley with three (3) goals to one (1).
yor: Nínú inú àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ tí ó wáyé ṣaájú lọ́jọ́ àbámẹ́tà, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Arsenal fàgbà han Burnley pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́ta sóókan

en: Southampton defeated Huddersfield with three (3) goals to one (1) special thanks to the goal scored by Micheal Obafemi.
yor: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Southampton fàgbà han Huddersfield pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́ta sóókan ọpẹ́ pàtàkì lọ́wọ́ àmì ayò tí Michael Ọbáfẹ́mi gbá sáwọ̀n.

en: Also Watford defeated Ham with two (2) goals to nothing, Bournemouth wins Brighton with two (2) goals to nothing.
yor: Bákan náà Watford lu West Ham pẹ̀lú àmì ayò méjì sí òdo Bournemouth na  Brighton pẹ̀lú àmì ayò méjì sí òdo

en: --- FIFA ranking: Eagles end 2018 in 44th spot
yor: --- ÀTẸ ÀJỌ FIFA: Ikọ̀ Super Eagles parí ọdún 2018 sípò kẹrìnlélógójì.

en: Super Eagles ended the year 2018 maintaining their 44th position in the latest FIFA World Ranking released on Thursday.
yor: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles parí ọdún 2018 pẹ̀lú dídi ipò kẹrìnlélógójì wọn mú síbẹ̀ nínú àtẹ àjọ FIFA tuntun tí wọ́n gbé jáde lọ́jọ́bọ (Thursday).

en: The three-time African champions also retained their fourth position in Africa.
yor: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù yìí tí ó ti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ lẹ́ẹ̀mẹta ọ̀tọ̀òtọ̀ tún di ipò kẹrin wọn mú ní ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ síbẹ̀.

en: Senegal also retained top spot in Africa with Tunisia, Morocco, Nigeria and DR Congo completing the top five teams on the continent.
yor: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè Senegal dipò kínní wọn mú síbẹ̀ pẹ̀lú bí ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Tunisia, Morocco, Nàìjíríà àti DR Congo ṣe pajú ikọ̀ márùn-ún àkọ́kọ́ ní ilẹ̀ náà dé.

en: Belgium remain top in the latest ranking with France (2nd, unchanged), Brazil (3rd, unchanged), Croatia (4th)  and England (5th).
yor: Belgium ni ó di ipò kínní mú síbẹ̀, France ipò kejì síbẹ̀, Brazil ipò kẹta síbẹ̀ Crotia wà ní ipo kẹrin, nígbà tí England wà ní ipò karùn-ún lágbàáyé.

en: The next FIFA/Coca-Cola World Ranking will be published on February 7, 2019.
yor: Ipò àtẹ àjọ FIFA/Coca-Cola mìíràn yóò tún jáde lọ́jọ́ keje, oṣù kejì, ọdún 2019.

en: --- Mourinho welcomed me back to Premier League- Ranieri
yor: --- Mourinho kí mi káàbọ̀ padà sínú ìdíje Premier League - Ranieri

en: Claudio Ranieri revealed on Thursday that Jose Mourinho was the first manager to welcome him back to the Premier League when he was appointed Fulham boss last month.
yor: Claudio Ranieri sọ lọ́jọ́bọ (Thursday) pé Jose Mourinho ni akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àkọ́kọ́ tí ó kí òun káàbọ̀ padà sínú ìdíje Premier League nígbà tí wọ́n yan òun gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Fulham lóṣù tó kọjá.

en: Fulham visit Old Trafford on Saturday, where Mourinho’s Manchester United will hope to secure their first Premier League victory in five games, reuniting the pair for the first time since Ranieri’s departure from Leicester.
yor: Ikọ̀ Fulham yóò tẹkọ̀ létí lọ sí pápá ìṣeré Old Trafford ní ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta (Saturday), níbi tí ìrètí wà pé ikọ̀ Manchester United yóò ti jáwé olúborí nínú ìdíje Premier League fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnṣẹ̀ márùn-ún ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀, èyí tí yóò tún gbé àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá méjéèjì pàdé ara wọn láti ìgbà tí Ranieri ti fi ikọ̀ Leicester sílẹ̀.

en: But the Fulham manager said: “He was the first who sent me a message to say ‘welcome back’.
yor: Àmọ́ ṣá, akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Fulham ti sọ pé  “Òun ni ẹni àkọ́kọ́ tó kọ́kọ́ fi àtẹ̀jíṣẹ́ ránṣẹ́ sími láti sọ pé ‘káàbọ̀ padà’

en: He is a very friendly friend.
yor: Ọ̀rẹ́ mi dạ́adáa ló jẹ́.

en: “I have known him for a long time, when he came to Chelsea and when he was in Italy, and he was very polite with me.
yor: Mo ti mọ̀ ọ́n láti ọjọ́ tó ti pẹ́, láti ìgbà tí ó wá sínú ikọ̀ Chelsea láti orílẹ̀-èdè Italy, o ń ṣe dáradára sími.

en: He’s a great man, coach, manager.
yor: Akínkanjú ọkùnrin, akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àti Alákòóso ni ó jẹ́.

en: Bottom side Fulham produced an encouraging performance in Wednesday’s 1-1 draw with Leicester, giving the 67-year-old Ranieri one victory, one draw and one defeat from his three matches in charge.
yor: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Fulham tí ó wà ní ìsàlẹ̀ tábìlì kópa tí ó wúni lórí nínú ọ̀mì àmì ayò kọ̀ọ̀kan pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Leicester lọ́jọ́rùú (Wednesday), èyí fún Ranieri ẹni ọdún mẹ́tàdínláàádọ́rin ní ìjáwé olúborí kan, ọ̀mì kan àti ìpàdánù kan pẹ̀lú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ mẹ́ta tí ó ti tukọ̀.

en: --- Presidency, NFF receive Falcons in Abuja
yor: --- Ilé-iṣẹ́ Ààrẹ, Àjọ NFF lọ pàdé ikọ̀ Super Falcons ní ìlú Àbújá.

en: The Chief of Staff to the President, Alhaji Abba Kyari,  led a delegation of prominent Nigerians and top officials of the Nigeria Football Federation who received the Super Falcons on arrival in Abuja on Sunday evening.
yor: Olórí òṣìṣẹ́ Ọba sí Ààrẹ Alhaji Abba Kyari, léwájú ìgbìmọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn jàǹkàn-jàǹkàn àti àwọn ọ̀gá àgbà nínú àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà (NFF) tí ó lọ pàdé ikọ̀ Super Falcons bí wọ́n ṣe dé sí ìlú Àbújá nírọ̀lẹ́ ọjọ́ Àìkù (Sunday).

en: Nine-time African champions, Super Falcons, flew into the Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport few minutes before 4pm.
yor: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Falcons tí ó ti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ àwọn Obìnrin ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ní ẹ̀ẹ̀mẹsàn-án ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ balẹ̀ sí pápákọ̀ òfurufú àgbááyé Nnamdi Azikiwe ní aago mẹ́rin ku ìṣẹ́jú díẹ̀.

en: Some of the Super Falcons team that flew into Abuja are NFF General Secretary, Dr Mohammed Sanusi, as well as other officials of the NFF.
yor: Lára àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ikọ̀ Super Falcons tí ó wọ ìlú Àbújá ni akọ̀wé àpapọ̀ àjọ NFF, Dókítà Mohammed Sanusi, tí ó fi mọ́ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ àjọ NFF mìíràn.

en: On Saturday at the Accra Sports Stadium, the Falcons prevailed over a resilient South African Banyana Banyana side 4-3 on penalties after a scoreless 120 minutes, to lift the top African women football diadem for the third successive time and ninth time overall.
yor: Ní ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta (Saturday), ní pápá ìṣeré Accra, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Falcons gbo ewúro sí ikọ̀ Banyana Banyana ti orílẹ̀-èdè South Africa lójú pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́rin sí mẹ́ta nínú golí-wò-mi-n-gbá-a-sí-ọ lẹ́yìn ọgọ́fà ìṣẹ́jú láìráwọ̀n he láti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ àwọn Obìnrin tí ó tóbi jù nilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ yìí ní ìgbà mẹ́ta lé ara wọn tí ó sì fi pé mẹ́sàn-án ní àpapọ̀.

en: “On behalf of Mr President, who is not in the country at the moment, we say welcome and well done to you.
yor: Ní orúkọ Ààrẹ, ẹni tí kò sí nílùú lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ báyìí, a kí gbogbo yín káàbọ̀ padà, ẹ sì tún kú iṣẹ́.

en: In fact, as we were leaving the airport, two eminent Nigerians called and donated the sum of N50m and N25m respectively to your team.
yor: Kódà, bí a ṣe ń kúrò ní pápákọ̀ ofurufú, àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà jàǹkàn méjì ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ pè wọ́n fún ṣètọrẹ àádọ́ta míllíọ́nù náírà (N50m) àti mílíọ́nù márùndínlọ́gbọ̀n náírà (N25m) fún ikọ̀ yìí.

en: Please rest very well.
yor: Ẹ jọ̀wọ́, ẹ sinmi dáradára.

en: We will get back to you with the activities lined up for you in the coming days.”
yor: A ó kàn si yín lórí àwọn ẹ̀tọ́ tí a ti là kalẹ̀ fun yín láìpẹ́

en: NFF General Secretary Mohammed Sanusi, said, “On behalf of the leadership of the NFF, we are grateful for the support from the Nigerian government, which has seen the team excel at the Cup of Nations.
yor: Akọ̀wé àpapọ̀ àjọ NFF, Mohammed Sanusi sọ báyìí pé, “Ní orúkọ àwọn adarí àjọ NFF, a mọ rírì àtìlẹyìn láti ọ̀dọ̀ ìjọba ilẹ̀ Nàìjííríà, èyí tí ó ran ikọ̀ yìí lọ́wọ́ láti ṣàṣeyọrí nínú ìdíje ifẹ ẹ̀yẹ náà.

en: The girls have promised to do their best to represent the country very well at the 2019 Women’s World Cup.”
yor: Àwọn ọmọbìnrin yìí ti wá ṣèlérí sísa gbogbo ipá wọn láti sojú orílẹ̀-èdè náà dáradára nínú ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé ọdún 2019.

en: --- Berhalter named coach of U.S. men’s national football team
yor: --- Berhalter ti di kíkéde gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù àwọn ọkùnrin orílẹ̀-èdè US.

en: Former Columbus Crew manager Gregg Berhalter was officially named the next coach of the U.S. men’s national football team on Sunday.
yor: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Columbus Crew tẹ́lẹ̀rí Gregg Berhalter ni wọ́n ti kéde gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tíṣé kan fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù àwọn ọkùnrin orílẹ̀-èdè US ní ọjọ́ àìkú (Sunday)

en: The 45-year-old Berhalter replaces interim coach Dave Sarachan to become the youngest coach to lead the team since Steve Sampson in 1995.
yor: Berhalter ẹni ọdún márùndínláàádọ́ta rọ́pò akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá fìdíhẹ̀ẹ́ Dave Sarachan láti di ẹni tí ó kẹ́rẹ́ jù tí yóò tu ikọ̀ náà láti àkókò Steve Sampson lọ́dun 1995.

en: “We are excited to announce Gregg as the next head coach of the U.S. Men’s National Team,” said U.S. Soccer president Carlos Cordeiro in a statement.
