en: Algerian international Riyad Mahrez secured his move to Premier League champions Manchester City on Tuesday, seven months after his hopes were dashed when City refused to pay Leicester’s asking price.
yor: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Algeria Riyad Mahrez parí ìtọkọ́sọ́ rẹ̀ lọsí ikọ̀ aṣáájú ìdíje Premier League, Manchester City lọ́jọ́ ìṣẹ́gun (Tuesday), lẹ́yìn oṣù méje tí ó ti sọ̀rètí nù làtàrí pé ikọ̀ City kọ̀ láti san owó tí ikọ̀ Leicester ń bèèrè fún.

en: This time though Leicester said they had sold him for what is a club-record fee, with some reports suggesting the champions paid £60 million ($79.6million), which would make it their record buy.
yor: Ní àsìkò yìí, ikọ̀ Leicester so pẹ́ àwọn tà á ní iye owó tí ó wọn inú ìwé ìtàn ikọ̀ náà, tí àwọn ìròyìn kan sì ń ní I lérò pé ikọ̀ aṣáájú yìí san ọgọ́ta mílíọ́nù owó pounds (Ọgọ́rin mílíọ́nù dín díẹ̀ Owó dọ́là) léyìí tí yóò sọ ọ́ di èyí tí ó ń wọ inú ìwé ìtàn.

en: The 27-year-old a pivotal figure when Leicester stormed to a shock Premier League title in 2016 signed a five-year contract.
yor: Ọmọ ọdún mẹ́tàdínlọ́gbọ̀n yìí tí ó jẹ́ èèkàn nígbà tí ikọ̀ Leicester gba ife Premier League lọ́nà ìyanu lọ́dún 2016 tọwọ́ bọ adéhùn ọdún márùn-ún.

en: “I am so pleased to have joined City, a side playing great football under Pep Guardiola,.
yor: “Inú mi dùn láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ City, ikọ̀ tí ó ń gbá bọ́ọ̀lù tó ta sánsán lábẹ́ Pep Guardiola.

en: Watching them from afar has been a pleasure.
yor: Wíwò wọ́n lókèèrè jẹ́ oun tí ó máa ń wù mí..

en: Pep is committed to playing attacking football, which is a perfect for me, and City’s performances last season were outstanding.” Mahrez said.
yor: Pep jẹ́ ẹni tí ó fi ara sí títi bọ́ọ̀lù síwájú, léyìí tí ó ṣe régí pẹ̀lú mi, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ìṣọwọ́ṣiṣẹ́ Cítì ní sáà tó lọ kò lẹ́gbẹ́” èyí ni Mahrez wí.

en: ---Spain appoints Luis Enrique as new coach
yor: ---Spain yan Luis Enrique gẹ́gẹ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tuntun.

en: Spain’s football federation says former Barcelona coach Luis Enrique has been appointed to take charge of the national team.
yor: Àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Spain ti sọ pé akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Barcelona tẹ̀lẹ̀rí Luis Enrique ti di yíyàn gẹ́gẹ́ láti gba àkóso ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè náà.

en: He replaces Julen Lopetegui, who was sacked on the eve of the World Cup after accepting the job at Real Madrid, with Fernando Hierro taking temporary charge for the finals in Russia.
yor: Ó rọ́pọ̀ Julen Lopetegui, tí wọ́n yọ níṣẹ́ ní ife ẹyẹ àgbááyé ku ọ̀la lẹ́yìn tí ó gba iṣẹ́ nínú ikọ̀ Real Madrid, nígbà tí Fernando Hierro ti ń tukọ̀ àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ní Russia fún igbà díẹ̀.

en: Luis Enrique has signed a two-year contract.
yor: Luis Enrique tọwọ́ bọ àdéhùn ọdún méjì.

en: --- World Cup trophy on display in Moscow
yor: --- Ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé di ṣíṣàfihàn ní Moscow

en: The FIFA World Football Museum exhibition will present the 2018 FIFA World Cup winners’ trophy for the entire day of Sunday in Moscow.
yor: Àjọ tó ń ṣàfihan nǹkan ìṣèmbayé eré ìdárayá FIFA yóò pàtẹ ìfe ẹ̀yẹ olùjáwé olúborí ọdún 2018 fún odidi ọjọ́ àìkú (Sunday) ní ìlú Moscow.

en: It will be displayed alongside the replica of the Jules Rimet Cup, the trophy that was first presented to winners in 1930 when the competition started.
yor: Yóò jẹ́ ṣíṣàfihàn pẹ̀lú ife ẹ̀yẹ irú rẹ̀, ife Jules Rimet, tí wọ́n kọ́kọ́ fún ẹni tí ó gba ìdìje náà lọ́dún 1930 nígbà tí ìdíje náà bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀.

en: The exhibition, known as “The History Makers’’, will hold at the Hyundai Motorstudio on New Arbat Avenue in Moscow.
yor: Ìṣàfihàn yìí tí a mọ̀ sí, “Àwọn Akọ̀tàn”, yóò wáyé ní yàrá àwòrán ilé-iṣẹ́ Hyundai Motorstudio ní agbègbè New ní ìlú Moscow.

en: The exhibition will end five days after the final match of the 2018 FIFA World Cup in Russia on July 15.
yor: Ìṣàfihàn yóò parí lẹ́yìn ọjọ́ karùn-ún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àsekágbá ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé ọdún 2018 lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia lọ́jọ́ kẹẹ̀ẹ́dógún oṣù keje.

en: World football body, FIFA, said in a statement on Saturday that admission to the exhibition was free, adding that media representatives were allowed to visit the exhibition, take photos or film inside.
yor: Àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lágbàáyé, FIFA, sọ nínú ọ̀rọ̀ kan lọ́jọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday) pé ọ̀fẹ́ ni ìwọlé sí ibi Ìṣàfihàn yìí, ó fi kún un pé wọ́n gba àwọn oníróyìn láàyè láti wọlé, láti ya àwòrán àti láti ká àwòrán sílẹ̀ níbẹ̀.

en: “The exhibition ground floor is a tribute to the passion and devotion of fans from all over the world and their role in making the FIFA World Cup a compelling spectacle.
yor: “Ibi ìṣàfihàn yìí jẹ́ ìmọrírì ìfẹ́ àti ìkọbiarasí àwọn alátìlẹyìn káàkiri àgbááyé àti ipa wọn lórí ríra iyì fún ife ẹ̀yẹ FIFA àgbááyé.

en: “There, visitors can see messages from fans of all 32 competing nations and a special display for the adidas Telstar Official Match Balls of the 2018 FIFA World Cup used for the kick-off of the 64 games played in Russia.
yor: “Níbẹ̀, àwọn olùbẹ̀wò le rí àtẹ̀jíṣẹ́ láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn alátìlẹyìn àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n tí wọn ń figa gbága àti àfihàn àwọn bọ́ọ̀lù tí wọn lò fún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ mẹ́rìnlélọ́gọ́ta ife ẹ̀yẹ FIFA àgbááyé ọdùn 2018 lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia tí ilé iṣẹ́ adidas pèsè.

en: “After each match, the ball which started the game is added to the growing collection at the exhibition,’’ a statement by Moritz Ansorge, the FIFA World Football Museum collections manager, indicated.
yor: “Lẹ́yìn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ kọ̀ọ̀kan, bọ́ọ̀lù tí ó bá bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà yóò di fífikún ara àwọn àfihàn yìí”,’’ ní ọ̀rọ̀ tí Moritz Ansorge alákòóso Àjọ tó ń ṣàfihan nǹkan ìṣèmbayé eré ìdárayá FIFA ṣe lálàyé.

en: --- Tite gets new 4 year contract
yor: --- Tite gba àdéhùn ọdún mẹ́rin mìíràn.

en: Brazil’s Football Federation (CBF) is offering head coach Tite a new four-year deal, despite the five-time World Champion’s elimination in the quarter-finals.
yor: Àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Brazil (CBF) ń fi àdéhùn ọdún mẹ́rin mìíràn lọ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ náà Tite tòhun tẹnu ìjakúrò nínú ife ẹ̀yẹ agbááyé lẹ́ẹ̀marùn-ún ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ láti ìpele kejì sí àṣekágbá.

en: According to the Brazilian website Globo, CBF is satisfied with the head coach’s work and is offering him a new contract.
yor: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Globo ìtàkùn ilẹ̀ Brazil ṣe sọ, Ìṣọwọ́ṣiṣẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà yìí tẹ́ Àjọ CBF lọ́rùn, wọ́n sì ń fi àdéhùn mìíràn lọ̀ ọ́.

en: The 57-year-old took charge of Brazil in June 2016 helping the team qualify for the 2018 FIFA World Cup from the first place among the South American teams.
yor: Ẹni ọdún mẹ́tàdínlọ́gọ́ta gba àkóso ikọ̀ Brazil ní inú oṣù kẹfà ọdún 2016, ó si ran ikọ̀ náà lọ́wọ́ láti pegedé sí inú ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé FIFA ọdún 2018 pẹ̀lú ipò kíní láti inú àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè ilẹ̀ Guusu America.

en: Under Tite’s management, Brazil have secured 20 victories and four draws losing only two games so far, including Friday’s defeat to Belgium.
yor: Lábẹ́ àkóso Tite, ikọ̀ Brazil ti jáwé olúborí ní ìgbà ogún, wọ́n ta ọ̀mì mẹ́rin wọ́n sì pàdánù lẹ́ẹ̀mejì péré, nínú rẹ̀ ni ìpàdánù ọjọ́ ẹtì (Friday) pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Belgium.
